, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP was founded by\npseudo-intellectual psychologists &nbsp;Richard Wayne Bandler ( MA ) and John Grinder (\nPHD) . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it comes to cerebral matters\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil has the capacity to carry this gruesome twosome on the\ntip of his prick, &nbsp;right to the railings\nand prickfork them overboard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>LADIES AND GENTLEMEN \u2013\nPUT ON YOUR FUCKIN\u2019 SEAT BELTS<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BE READY FOR THE\n<span style=\"color: red;\">GREATEST INTELLECTUAL RIDE</span> EVER -- &nbsp;PAST\nPRESENT AND FUTURE.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been commanding ships\nfor 30 years. &nbsp;&nbsp;Never manipulated anyone\u2014and I am proud of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not that I am\nunaware of modus operandi of covert deception \u2013which Bandler baby and Grinder\nbaby would not even dream of in their ultimate wet dreams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UV4-pYBnSU8/WFnGpUPey1I/AAAAAAABP0A/ZKfHruzacdwD4Xj0DYmrm8rQnamEYUnBwCLcB/s1600/e95dedca2U2c44b96eb1c0c6abc318603.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UV4-pYBnSU8/WFnGpUPey1I/AAAAAAABP0A/ZKfHruzacdwD4Xj0DYmrm8rQnamEYUnBwCLcB/s400/e95dedca2U2c44b96eb1c0c6abc318603.jpg\" width=\"368\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is an instance \u2013 I\njust did it to prove a point to a captain sans ethos, who lost his bearings . &nbsp;This is NOT who I am<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A quarter century ago, I\nhad walked into a captains cabin to take over command of the ship.&nbsp; The outgoing master was in animated\nconference with the bosun and the ships laundryman.&nbsp; From the laundryman\u2019s \u201c I don\u2019t give a damn \u201c\n, body language I could see that he that he was on the warpath.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Both sailors were sent\naway and we settled down to the formal process of handing / taking over\ncommand. I could see that the outgoing captain could not harness his mind to\nthe job\u2014his mind was chattering . So I asked him, what transpired with the\nlaundryman.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>To cut a long story\nshort, the laundryman had refused to do a particular job. He was right, and he\nhad a point. For he was employed to wash stewards uniforms ( white tunics and\npants ) \u2013 not civilian clothes. At the same time the stewards had a point, as\nthey had won civilian clothes on duty due to water rationing at a long\nanchorage.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I told the captain \u201c\nyou just call him back and I will make him agree to what he refused to do ,\njust a few minutes ago\u2014 even if he was sacked or his knee caps were broken\u201d.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I then took a A4 size\npaper and wrote down 10 questions , whose answers required the answer YES.&nbsp; The last and 10th question would be \u201c are you\nwilling to wash the clothes , you refused to wash\u201d .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The captain was clean\nbowled.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Here was a guy telling\nthat he could do the impossible. He wanted to see the questionnaire , and I\ngave it to him. All I wanted him to do was sit in the bedroom behind the\ncurtains and hear the proceedings\u2014to check if I followed the script.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So pretty soon the bosun\nand laundryman were called back.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I shot off the first\nquestion, after introducing myself as the new captain.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>1)Are you the\nlaundryman ?\u2014YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>2)Is you name Mr so and\nso? \u2013 YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>3)You have come to the\nship to earn money for your family?\u2014YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>4)You have refused to\nwash the stewards civilian clothes?\u2014YES ( he started to give an explanation \u2013I\nstopped him by raising my hand )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>5)These civilian\nclothes were worn during water rationing \u2013YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>6th to 9th is\nclassified-<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>10TH QUESTION \u2014 SO WILL\nYOU WASH THE CLOTHES NOW , SO THAT I DON\u2019T HAVE TO SEND YOU HOME \u2013&nbsp; \u201cYES SIR!\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The average human mind\nis not programmed or intelligent enough&nbsp;\nto open its doors wide and then suddenly slam shut.</i></span><i style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">If you can indeed slam\nit shut and give NO answer after 9 consecutive YES answers \u2013then you are a\nsuper genius\u2014like the legendary James Bond.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dianetics comes from\nthe Greek dia meaning \u201cthrough\u201d and nous, \u201c soul.\u201d Dianetics is further defined\nas \u201cwhat the soul is doing to the body.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dianetics uncovers the\nsource of unreasonable fears, upsets and insecurities, unexplainable pains,\nsensations and emotions (psychosomatic illnesses) and sets forth effective\nhandlings for these conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By use of the\nprocedures of Dianetics it became apparent that the source of these conditions\nwere not cells or cellular memory, but a beingness that defied time. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WzpS2bPlz48/WFpMKVtf5rI/AAAAAAABP1Q/CLZ7jFGAmL8EPsQP4dcqlgeWMnYUbUcKQCLcB/s1600/Diane77tics55.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WzpS2bPlz48/WFpMKVtf5rI/AAAAAAABP1Q/CLZ7jFGAmL8EPsQP4dcqlgeWMnYUbUcKQCLcB/s400/Diane77tics55.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The discovery of past\nlives was followed by the phenomena of exteriorization\u2014the detachment of one\u2019s\nspirit from the body while yet fully conscious and aware.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With this\ndiscovery\u2014and the inescapable conclusion that one is a spiritual being\u2014the\nScientology religion was born.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scientology is defined\nas \u201cthe study and handling of the spirit in relationship to itself, to\nuniverses and to other life.\u201d Through the practice of Scientology one can\nincrease his spiritual awareness and ability and realize his own immortality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dianetics, though it\nmight not have guessed it in its early publication, was dealing with the human\nspirit. Dianetics is a forerunner and substudy of Scientology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_13.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_13.html</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hhqumfpxuzI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/hhqumfpxuzI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The muffs say \u2013 NLP is \u201cthe\nstudy of subjective experience and what can be predicted from it\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilOctober 13, 2016 at 12:04 PM<br />\nVikhyat Singh<br />\nOctober 13, 2016 at 10:27 AM<br />\nCAPTAIN,<br />\nAs per sanatan dharm, what is the nature of morality (subjective or objective)?<br />\n<br />\n####################################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nOctober 13, 2016 at 11:55 AM<br />\nhi vs,<br />\n<br />\nDON\u2019T EVER BOTHER TO SEEK AN ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION ( OBJECTIVE/ SUBJECTIVE MORALITY FROM ANY BOOK ON THIS PLANET OR FROM THE INTERNET.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NOBODY WHO HAS THE FUCKIN\u2019 WISDOM TO ANSWER YOUR PROFOUND QUESTION .<br />\n<br />\nThe reason morality is subjective is because there is no common moral law that ALL people agree on.<br />\n<br />\nIf objective moral codes existed like \"murder is bad\" than there would be no murderers. But there are murderers. The reason most societies outlaw murder is because it is for the logical salvation of the society.<br />\n<br />\nObjective morality is the idea that a certain system of ethics or set of moral judgments is not just true according to a person's subjective opinion, but factually true.<br />\n<br />\nProponents of this theory would argue that a statement like \"Murder is wrong\" can be as objectively true as \"1 + 1 = 2.\"<br />\n<br />\nMost of the objective morals promoted today are grounded in Abrahamic religions .<br />\n<br />\nAmong Christians, it follows from the ideas of inherent human sinfulness and original sin that one's subjective moral instincts must be categorically classed as evil.<br />\n<br />\nIn claustrophobic Abrahamic religions , there is a pervasive message that whatever we're searching for is completely and utterly separate from us.<br />\n<br />\nAs per Sanatana Dharma morality has been ingrained within us. Somewhere deep down, embedded in our DNA, is the coding for morality. Somehow people know at a very young age that stealing is wrong.<br />\n<br />\nFor some, morality is something that is either taught, learned, or gained through familial contact or social interaction.<br />\n<br />\nYet there are people who didn't have good parents, or who had no parents at all, or who grew up without much social interaction or exposure to accessible information but who still know the basic \"rules\" for morality.<br />\n<br />\nFor others, morality seems to be something that we have to achieve or earn via some middle man in robes<br />\n<br />\nMorality isn't a rule. It isn't a plumb line. Morality cannot exists without context. Bhagawad Gita was the ultimate lesson in morality within the perimeter of context .<br />\n<br />\nMorality aint no tool to determine who is in and who is out. It is something that is part of each person. We don't earn morality; it earns us.<br />\n<br />\nMorality is a gene -- not one that we can see or study, but one that evolves progressively over time. Unlike other genes, it is affected and altered by the decisions we make and don't make. It is transformed by compassion and deformed by the lack of it.<br />\n<br />\nMorality is in us. We are all moral unless you have criminal DNA and the programming is corrupt.<br />\n<br />\nIts how we choose to use that knowledge that will determine how we nurture the growth of morality within us.<br />\n<br />\nSo, the origins of morality lie in each human being but are grown through the everyday process of making choices.<br />\n<br />\nLaws of Karma and Dharma has guided the Hindu since time immemorial . There was never any DOGMA lumped down the Hindu\u2019s throat.<br />\n<br />\nMorals are encouraged by living in a moral society or community. But they are birthed in each person, each individual. They are also spurred on by what we choose to expose our minds to.<br />\n<br />\nMoral subjectivity is not the enemy to the progress of any society; moral homogeneity is.<br />\n<br />\nMoral homogeneity says that everyone needs to see everything the same way, to fit into neat little boxes, and it is used to marginalize those who don't.<br />\n<br />\nMoral subjectivity leads a society to embrace diversity by seeing that a particular worldview isn't the only right one.<br />\n<br />\nA subjective morality is one rooted in human feelings and conscience .<br />\n<br />\nNatural justice is inherent. These are the things that are most important to us, indeed the only things important to us!<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; WHEN A SHIP INCPECTOR INSPECTS THE SHIP, HE MUST BE OBJECTIVE. HE MUST NOT ALLOW HIS EMOTIONS TO RULE.<br />\n<br />\nSAME WITH A JUDGE IN A COURT. NATURAL JUSTICE AND CONSCIENCE IS LOCKED UP AND THROWN AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SUITED JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO ENSLAVED INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD CREATED ASHTAVAKRA GITA AND HAS USED HIS FAKE GURUS TO PROPAGATE IT SANATANA DHARMA IS NOT LIKE THE TEN COMMANDMENTS SYSTEM OF SINGLE MESSIAH CHRISTIANITY.<br />\n<br />\nWE HINDUS DO NOT NEED A MESSIAH TO TELL US WHAT IS RIGHT AND WHAT IS WRONG.<br />\n<br />\nLIKE THIS BLOGSITE HINDUISM TELLS ALL TO USE THEIR CONSCIENCE. OBJECTIVE MORALITY BREEDS FALSE EXCUSES<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTANGIBLE LAW IS THE OBJECTIVE FORM OF MORALITY. OBJECTIVE IS INDEPENDENT OF PEOPLEs OPINIONS.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE MORALS FOR CHRISTIANS EMANATE FROM THE TEN COMMANDMENTS.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE MORALITY IGNORED CONTEXT .<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIAN / ISLAM MORALITY IS OBJECTIVE, THE SINGLE MESSIAH AND SINGLE HOLY BOOK DICTATES DOGMA.<br />\n<br />\nATHEIST COMMUNISTS AND SINGLE MESSIAH / HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS ARE OBJECTIVE WITH MORALITY. THEY HAVE FAILED .<br />\n<br />\nRELIGION IS DOING WHAT YOU ARE TOLD REGARDLESS OF WHAT IS RIGHT.<br />\n<br />\nRULES DON\u2019T MAKE US MORAL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS SUBJECTIVE.<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE IS STRICTLY WITHIN HUMANS BEINGS \u2013IT DERIVES FROM OUR INTANGIBLE CONSCIENCE ALONE.<br />\n<br />\nIN SUBJECTIVE MORALITY PERCEPTION WITHIN PERIMETER OF CONTEXT IS PARAMOUNT.<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE IS DEPENDENT ON PEOPLEs OPINIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMAIS BASED ON CONSCIOUS HUMAN CONSCIENCE. NO MAN CAN MANIPULATE OR SILENCE HIS CONSCIENCE. WE ARE NOT THE SOURCE OF OUR OWN CONSCIENCE.<br />\n<br />\nBHAGAWAD GITA IS OUR GUIDE NOT ASHTAVAKRA GITA COOKED UP BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WITH Dos AND DONTs<br />\n<br />\nENEMIES OF HINDUISM USES FAKE GURUS LIKE TRIPLE SRI TO CONVERT SANATANA DHARMA TO AN OBJECTIVE RELIGION. SORRY, IT WONT WORK<br />\n<br />\nSPIRITUALLY SOAKED HINDUS ARE SUBJECTIVE WITH MORALITY. ONLY THIS WORKS<br />\n<br />\nMORALITY IS DOING WHAT IS RIGHT, REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOUR ARE TOLD.<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE MORALITY HAS NO SCOPE FOR EXCUSES. LOVE , COMPASSION AND FAIRNESS MAKE US MORAL.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism was developed along spiritual lines, NOT religious lines\u2014the reason why 800 years of slavery could NOT stamp out this amazing way of life..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is NOT a religion, it is the practice of spirituality by elevating human consciousness in the personal quest for truth.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_195MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_195BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_195B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_196B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2195153441608560896\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_196M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Why do you think the spirituality seeking white man goes to these places in droves?<br />\n<br />\nThese foreigners can comprehend that Hinduism is based on reason and NOT faith -- unless the faith is an extension of reason.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is a relentless pursuit of truth, flexible to suit all situations.<br />\n<br />\nAt the heart of Hinduism remains mans' essential quest for union with the Absolute supreme the brahmAn. In addition to tradition and moral order, it also signifies the path of knowledge and correct action ( Dharma ).<br />\n<br />\nIslam and Christianity are religions. These religions had Inquisitions.<br />\n<br />\nJews were too busy following their VULGAR and racist Talmud.<br />\n<br />\nAhimsa ( non-violence ) even vegetarianism , is a characteristic of Hinduism\u2014due to which vile foreign invaders took advantage..<br />\n<br />\nWhat the waitress calls SAFFRON TERROR -- is just the hindus making a free choice NOT to be cowards anymore and giving back as good as they got.<br />\n<br />\nToday when a patient and tolerant Hindu gets outraged and decides to retaliate, rivers of blood flows on the streets .<br />\n<br />\nHinduism can never dream of all this for openness and inclusivity is the essence of Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is a spiritual code. Know thyself is the quintessence.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism has a total lack of compulsions. You cannot get ex-communicated for NOT toeing the line.<br />\n<br />\nThe diversity, the range, and the lofty metaphysical aspirations of Vedanta are mind boggling.<br />\n<br />\nLoaded truth is delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in Islam.<br />\n<br />\nThese truths are then recorded in scriptures that serve as a source of knowledge of divine wisdom: the Hebrew Bible, the New Testament of the Christian Bible, and the Koran. In the Hindu tradition, by utter contrast, there is no single revelation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu spirituality tradition , unlike other religions -- has always concerned itself with the \u201chuman\u201d situation rather than the \u201cour religion \u201c situation.<br />\n<br />\nUnder the doctrine of karma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual-and NOT what is being told as gospel in a holy book .<br />\n<br />\nAsk the Jews\u2014they will say India is the only place where they never got persecuted over thousands of years\u2014they always ran here for refuge.<br />\n<br />\nThe reason ?<br />\n<br />\nThis country had denizens steeped in spirituality \u2014 NOT religious bigots. Hebrew religion and Hinduism co-existed.<br />\n<br />\nYet today foreign funded Indian TV calls all Hindus bigots \u2013what a joke !.<br />\n<br />\nI AM LUCKY TO BE BORN IN INDIA\u2014 HAVING SEEN WHAT THE REST OF THIS PLANET HAS TO OFFER FOR 40 YEARS .!<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c174955418676181743\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_60M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you understand the techniques\nof NLP you can see it coming.&nbsp; Beware of\nextreme hypocrisy , where you are trained to be a fake character like the evangelist\nwho is not you..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen almost every single pastors are using this\ntechnique in their arsenal during TV sermons.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although NLP started in the field\nof therapy, it has now been expanded to include such diverse topics as sales, unethical\npersuasion ( selling an expensive comb to a bald man ) &nbsp;and even seduction ( ladies beware).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The founder of NLP Richard\nBandler was a conman. He was arrested for First Degree murder in 1988 and\ncharged with the murder of his bookkeeper, who was also running a call-girl\noperation on the side. He had plunged headlong into cocaine addiction and had a\nmessed up mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Triple Sri\u2019s ART OF\nLIVING used NLP techniques. I sent my wife to do this course giving her the\nnecessary instructions on the basics of NLP.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She did hyperventilation ( Sudarshan Kriya-- SO HUM ) exactly as what was told .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">The last straw was being told to drive around\non an imaginary scooter doing </span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practitioners have been \u2018programmed\u2019 to believe the \u2018programme\u2019, giving\nthem the right to \u2018programme\u2019 others.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xfr929xXE_4/WFsetEaB3CI/AAAAAAABP1g/-faosQdW7lU2U5P_uxwrQqhqMLlRrm7HACLcB/s1600/down88load.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"222\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xfr929xXE_4/WFsetEaB3CI/AAAAAAABP1g/-faosQdW7lU2U5P_uxwrQqhqMLlRrm7HACLcB/s400/down88load.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\u2019s what cults do.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ever criticised NLP\nin front of a NLP practitioner? Like all fundamentalists they respond with the\nfull force of the fanatic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NLP expert will\ntell you that it is science. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Selling a comb to a bald man is con science. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP is not a unified\ntheory, it\u2019s a mindless hotch\u2013potch of theories, all unverified. They have\ncherry picked epistemology from &nbsp;ancient\nIndian Vedanta. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have NOT yet seen a\nwhite man who can teach life management. They need to come to India to learn\nthis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/life-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/life-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/humor-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/humor-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Richard Bandler and\nJohn Grinder produced a messy soup of new age thinking. It folded in hypnosis,\npsychotherapy and unconscious thinking (and to be frank any corny rubbish that\ncomes their way) into a suitably palatable khichdi for the gullible. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP Trainers love it as it has lots of little\nchildish tricks for classroom courses\u2014 and they go further --privacy intrusion , if they fancy anybody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amway uses NLP\ntechniques . &nbsp;The claim is that rapport\ncan be enhanced using such predatory &nbsp;techniques, therefore fooling people into\ndoing what you want; working harder, buying your product etc. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carrot and stick hardly works on intelligent\nhumans--and this is NOT what a leader does to his team.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This is gonna be a\nvery long post.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/naive-sailor-unperforated-uti-extension.html?showComment=1481288240045#c735459180157770056\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2016 at 6:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWHY WERE YOU SUCH A SUCCESSFUL SHIP CAPTAIN-- YOU HAVE WRITTEN SEVERAL POSTS ON MANAGEMENT , BUT LOOKS LIKE YOU HAVE KEPT CERTAIN SECRETS AWAY<br />\n<br />\nINDEED !<br />\n<br />\nOK--LET ME GIVE A TEASER<br />\n<br />\nTHE \"FULCRUM\" WAS ALWAYS IN MY POCKET.<br />\n<br />\nI ADJUSTED THE FULCRUM OF THE LEVER MYSELF-- NEVER DELEGATED OR ABDICATED THE FULCRUM ADJUSTMENT JOB--<br />\n<br />\nFULCRUM is a thing that plays a central or essential role in an activity, event, or situation.<br />\n<br />\nA simple lever pivots on a fulcrum. If you understand how this works you already know 50%</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Fulcrum (pivot / axis ) decides on QUANTITY VERSUS QUALITY</span></div>\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YlYEi0PgG1g<br />\n<br />\nI even decided on JOY and PAIN or FRUSTRATION and REWARD. People knew this and nobody fucked around with me.<br />\n<br />\nThere are paradoxes<br />\n<br />\nFor example in speed reading -- this is a quantum act, there is hardly any trade off between speed and comprehension like the classical quality / quantity lever on a fulcrum.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/speed-reading-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS FOR NARENDRA MODI<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW YOUR PATHETIC \u201cNEED FOR QUANTITY\u201d<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER QUALITY INCREASES WHEN QUANTITY REDUCES<br />\n<br />\nTHIS APPLIES TO VEDIC A2 MILK, VEDIC SEEDS ETC<br />\n<br />\nA HUMPLESS WESTERN JERSEY COW WHO GIVES A 200 LITRE DRUM OF MILK A DAY IS NOT SUPERIOR TO A HUMPED VEDIC COW WHICH GIVES ONLY ONE 10 LITRE BUCKET OF MILK.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI\u2014 NEXT TIME YOU DEAL WITH GM COMPANIES / GENETIC ENGINEERING COMPANIES REMEMBER THE LINE ABOVE.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Snake oil is a\nsubstance with no real medicinal value sold as a remedy for all diseases. By\nextension, a snake oil salesman is someone who knowingly sells fraudulent goods\nor who is themselves a fraud, quack, or charlatan.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP is\nmass marketed psychobabble nay neurobabble by quintessential snake oil\nsalesmen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP is mass marketed\nflimflam. &nbsp;Its a vague and confusing set\nof conflicting platitudes \u2013 its untestable and therefore NLP fits the bill as\nan archetypal pseudoscience.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;NLP draws on different schools of psychology,\nhowever&nbsp; none of its presuppositions are\noriginal (drawing from different disciplines and theories) and is marketing is\nextremely agressive. The creators were either peabrained or on hardcore drugs..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The core theories of NLP are utterly wrong, including the sensual mode\nstrategies. The linguistic metamodel is also largely incorrect by normal\npsycholinguistic standards. The presuppositions really are unnecessary new age\ngloss.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is absolutely no need at all to adopt those\npresuppositions/beliefs, and it seems the main reason for having them in any\nform is to stifle the critical thinking/complaints of the consumer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What NLPers call\n'nominalisations' are what philosophers call 'reification'; using a noun as an\nadjective NLP uses crass and banal platitudes as a kind of fake \u201cepistemology\u201d that\nappeals mostly to gullible new agers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP\u2019s neuroscience \u2013 mindless\novergeneralizations: NLP\u2019s linguistics \u2013 bullshit. NLP\u2019s programming \u2013 occult balderdash.\nThe only way a NLP proponent can defend it is by attacking the one asking for\nproof or authentication.\u2014or as a last resort spew more pseudoscientific\nargument to baffle <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP is about 95%\nnonsense and the core ideas/ideals are 100% nonsense. Whatever of 5% can be\nused I will expound at the end of this post.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">They are indeed different than NLP\nways for people to suppress emotionally troubling memories - a way to help\npatients with post-traumatic stress disorder or anxiety to gain control of\ndebilitating memories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can go from ZILCH to\ncertified Master NLP Trainer in three weekends.&nbsp;\nWhile for an Indian sage its takes an entire lifetime of deep inner\nexperience \u2013wisdom is born within this crucible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This implies in turn that all languages have a common structural basis: the set of rules known as \"universal grammar\" ( sic )..<br /><br />Sanskrit is the mother of all language . .<br /><br />I know Sanskrit\u2014Chomsky does not. .<br /><br />My mother tongue Malayalam is the closet language on this planet to Sanskrit-- and I studied Sanskrit in school ..<br /><br />Sanskrit is the oldest language on this planet , while Malayalam ( the language of Danavas ) is second oldest. .<br /><br />Every vestige of ancient Indian knowledge is Danava. . I am a Danava..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">In Sanskrit every word (except adverbs and particles) is inflected, and the grammatical inflexion itself shows the relation in which one word stands to another.. Thus grammatically speaking, there is no order as such that need be much attended to ....&nbsp;</span><br /><br />CHOMSKY HAS NO RIGHT TO CALL HIMSELF A LINGUISTICS EXPERT WITHOUT BASIC UNDERSTANDING OF SANSKRIT\u2014THE MOTHER OF ALL LANGUAGES . ..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SRUTI OF VEDAS IN SANSKRIT IS 400 CENTURIES OLD\u2026</span></b><br /><br />CHOOT Chomsky spAke\u2014\u201cA grammar contains a syntactic component, a semantic component and a phonological component...The syntactic component consists of a base and a transformational component. The base, in turn, consists of a categorial subcomponent and a lexicon. The base generates deep structures. A deep structure enters the semantic component and receives a semantic interpretation; it is mapped by transformational rules into a surface structure, which is then given a phonetic interpretation by the rules of the phonological component\u201d..<br /><br />In above grammar model of CHOOT CHOMSKY , syntax is given a prominent, generative role, whereas phonology and semantics are assigned secondary, interpretive roles..<br /><br />The theoretical constructs and principles of the generative grammar introduced by Chomsky such as deep structures, transformations, autonomy and primacy of syntax, etc. deserve to be shat on and thrown on Chomsky\u2019s face. ..<br /><br />I am sorry, I have been reduced to this\u2026<br /><br />Mindless Chomskyanism has been the dominant paradigm in linguistics for nearly forty years\u2026<br /><br />So, so , so-- If you toe CHOOT Chomsky\u2019s line, you are a genius ?..<br /><br />Not any more !.<br /><br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_57BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedvynD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_57BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedvynD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_54T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_54TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_54B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2448629017141913090\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br /><br />Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) was invented in the mid-70s by Richard Bandler (a psychology and philosophy graduate) and John Grinder (a linguist). It originally grew out of observations made in therapy, and a metaphorical extension of some of the concepts of Chomsky\u2019s transformational grammar..<br /><br />Noam Chomsky developed the BULLSHIT idea that each sentence in a language has two levels of representation \u2014 a deep structure and a surface structure. The deep structure represents the core semantic relations of a sentence, and is mapped onto the surface structure (which follows the phonological form of the sentence very closely) via transformations. .<br /><br />All this in a BULLSHIT language called English\u2026<br /><br />Chomsky emphasized the priority of generative syntax over semantics in linguistics. When some of his former students proposed generative semantics, Chomsky denounced them with such vehemence that they couldn\u2019t get published in mainstream linguistics journals. Hey, \u201cSyntax without semantics is meaningless.\u201d..<br /><br />A sentence like \"They criticized the party on the beach\" is ambiguous\u2026<br /><br />The consituent \"on the beach\" could relate to either \"the beach\" or \"criticized\", and thus two different parse trees (syntactic interpretations) can describe this sentence..<br /><br />The two semantic interpreations corresponding to the trees would be:--<br /><br />E.g. They criticized the party, which took place on the beach..<br />or<br />They criticized the party while walking on the beach..<br /><br />While the first interpretation stands out as more likely, one could imagine a context, where the second interpretation is possible. ..This is why English is a BULLSHIT language ..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: purple;\">Mantras language must have\u2014<br />1) More than 5000 years old<br />2) Accurate expression<br />3) Clear speech and perfect pronunciation<br />4) No changes since it was first made<br />5) Must have a meaning built into every word and hence must have immense vocabulary.<br />6) Must have precise golden ratio sound harmonics ( Fibonacci/ Sri Yantra )<br />7) Mathematical and geometrical precision<br />8) Phonetic\u2014direct link between sound and signs<br />9) Script must be based on the spoken form<br />10) Cannot have spellings like English<br />11) Cannot have silent alphabets<br />12) Words must unfold from seed forms<br />13) Natural continuity is word making<br />14) Natural continuity in sentence making<br />15) Sound must have vibration<br />16) Sounds must have resonance\u2014 (this is just the tip of the iceberg )<br />17) Alphabets must form in cymatics when uttered<br />18) Must not have proper nouns<br />19) Must be polite with no bad words in the un- abridged dictionary<br />20) Mantras in this language must be approved by a gifted seer and the effect felt on his chakras</span><br /><br />Only Sanskrit qualifies for all above\u2026<br /><br />CUNT NOAM CHOMSKY MUST LEARN SANSKRIT \u2013AND THEN BURN ALL HIS BULLSHIT BOOKS ON LINGUISTICS..<br /><br />This blogsite does NOT get impressed with Noam Chomsky. The deep structure is converted by transformational rules into a surface structure that corresponds more closely to what is pronounced and heard. The rationale is that certain constructions, if they were listed in the mind as surface structures, would have to be multiplied out in thousands of redundant variations that would have to have been learned one by one, whereas if the constructions were listed as deep structures, they would be simple, few in number, and economically learned.\" ..<br /><br />BLAH BLAH FUCKIN\u2019 BLAH..<br /><br />JEW CHOMSKY --THE KING OF ALL OBFUSCATORS ..<br /><br />To give NLP an aura of infallibility they had LIED that NLP are all formal models based on mathematical, logical principles such as predicate calculus and the mathematical equations underlying holography.
