Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "257", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/9005032295903778369/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5684282639237552823", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2016-12-19T04:16:00+05:30", "updated": "2016-12-19T21:51:57+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDgyMTY0NTE3OTM1Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/grain-loading-calculations-on-bulk.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5684282639237552823", "title": "GRAIN LOADING CALCULATIONS ON BULK CARRIERS - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">GRAIN STABILITY CALCULATIONS , &nbsp;RIGHTING &nbsp;LEVER, &nbsp;GRAIN HEELING MOMENT, &nbsp;CURVES OF STATISTICAL STABILITY, &nbsp;DRAFT CALCULATIONS, </span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-i6au1rWcp20/WFcal1pqCaI/AAAAAAABPxI/2ok5H_MTn24cUDUADV4iYa73ft5ZWrHPQCLcB/s1600/downlRRoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"479\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-i6au1rWcp20/WFcal1pqCaI/AAAAAAABPxI/2ok5H_MTn24cUDUADV4iYa73ft5ZWrHPQCLcB/s640/downlRRoad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">General<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International Code\nfor the Safe Carriage of Grain in Bulk (International Grain Code), adopted by\nresolution MSC.23 (59), has been mandatory under SOLAS chapter VI since 1\nJanuary 1994. The term \"grain\" covers wheat, maize (corn), oats, rye,\nbarley, rice, pulses, seeds and processed forms thereof, whose behaviour is\nsimilar to that of grain in its natural state. The International Grain Code\napplies to ships regardless of size, including those of less than 500 gross\ntonnage, engaged in the carriage of grain in bulk and to which part C of SOLAS\nchapter VI applies. The purpose of the Code is to provide an international\nstandard for the safe carriage of grain in bulk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M-_b8KX7RtY/WFcadinRZiI/AAAAAAABPxE/yj-MBI1Lbc8Tbtm-52Or1y2rBgABrEcoACLcB/s1600/doDDwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M-_b8KX7RtY/WFcadinRZiI/AAAAAAABPxE/yj-MBI1Lbc8Tbtm-52Or1y2rBgABrEcoACLcB/s640/doDDwnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Outline<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International Grain\nCode requires a document of authorization to be issued for every ship loaded in\naccordance with the Code. The document of authorization serves as evidence that\nthe ship is capable of complying with the requirements of the Code and it must\nbe accompanied or incorporated into the grain loading manual which contains\ninformation that enables the master to meet the stability requirements of the\nCode. A copy of the document of compliance together with the grain loading\nstability data and associated plans shall be carried on board in order that the\nmaster, if so required, shall produce them for the inspection of the\nContracting Government of the country of the port of loading.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xD2YkH7SMmk/WFcawtJ-LSI/AAAAAAABPxQ/pfT3aSw6RfsSciKe21vvaVwVw4znFGd7QCLcB/s1600/BergeEEStahl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"448\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xD2YkH7SMmk/WFcawtJ-LSI/AAAAAAABPxQ/pfT3aSw6RfsSciKe21vvaVwVw4znFGd7QCLcB/s640/BergeEEStahl.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOTIFICATION OF\nLOADING, OR SAILING AFTER PARTIAL DISCHARGE, OF BULK GRAIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marine Order 33 Cargo\nand Cargo Handling - Grain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GENERAL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chapter VI of the SOLAS\n1974 Convention, as amended, and Australian legislation (Marine Order 33 [Cargo\nand Cargo Handling \u2013 Grain] require that ships intending to carry grain cargoes\nin bulk from Australian ports may be requested to demonstrate compliance with\nthe International Grain Code.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This form provides the\nmeans by which the Australian Maritime Safety Authority will determine whether\nthe Master will be required to demonstrate compliance with the stability\nrequirements of the Code to an attending AMSA Surveyor prior to loading his\nship. AMSA226 provides the means by which the Master can demonstrate compliance\nwith the stability requirements of the Code.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOLAS 1974 requires the\ncargo shipper to provide the Master or his representative with appropriate\ninformation on the cargo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beyond this it is the\nMaster\u2019s responsibility to ensure the proper stowage of the cargo in accordance\nwith Marine Order 33.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z-U15nGgHHA/WFca8ALA8QI/AAAAAAABPxU/wPlLx-OHghgZviFecZbcqKp4nmLhw0KkACLcB/s1600/grain-onJJ-a-ship.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"446\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z-U15nGgHHA/WFca8ALA8QI/AAAAAAABPxU/wPlLx-OHghgZviFecZbcqKp4nmLhw0KkACLcB/s640/grain-onJJ-a-ship.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INSTRUCTIONS TO MASTERS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This form is required\nto be submitted to AMSA at least 72 hours prior to the vessels proposed\ncommencement of loading. If an inspection is deemed to be necessary prior to\nthe commencement of loading AMSA will notify the Master/Agent accordingly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of\nintending to sail after partial discharge, a completed form is required to be\nsubmitted to AMSA at least 24 hours prior to the anticipated time of sailing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Master or Agent is\nrequired to submit the form to the nearest AMSA office of the port at which\ngrain is to be loaded or partially discharged (see over).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A separate form is\nrequired to be submitted for each successive port the master may lodge all the\nnotifications together for each port to the relevant office prior to the first\nport of call or alternatively, individually to each appropriate office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strict adherence to the\nlayout of this form is not necessary as long as the information required by it\ncan be provided by alternate means.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A new form is required\nto be submitted to AMSA if there is any significant change in the loading plan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F8p47Z7a_iI/WFcbLWdhAEI/AAAAAAABPxY/IlGsUgfXUL8pzyZ_9frWV8oztRDLj4a1QCLcB/s1600/75658544K.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F8p47Z7a_iI/WFcbLWdhAEI/AAAAAAABPxY/IlGsUgfXUL8pzyZ_9frWV8oztRDLj4a1QCLcB/s640/75658544K.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOTES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMSA applies the\nfollowing provisions when assessing compliance with the Code:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. The Code requires\nall compartments in which grain is stowed to be either \u201cfilled\u201d (trimmed or\nuntrimmed) or \u201cpartly filled\u201d (trimmed only). AMSA does not accept \u201cpartly\nfilled\u201d compartments untrimmed, even if data for these is approved by the flag\nState Administration, as they are not provided for in the Code.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. AMSA cannot accept a\ncompartment as being \u201cfilled\u201d if the average ullage at the coaming exceeds the\nminimum required to accommodate the structure of hatch covers or 100mm,\nwhichever is greater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Untrimmed moments\nmay only be used for filled compartments with the ends untrimmed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. (NB: Some Australian\ngrain loading terminals lack the facility to adequately trim the ends of filled\ncompartments and Masters must check the facilities at their load ports if they\nconsider they need to trim the ends of any compartments in order to meet the\nrequired stability criteria).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. In partly filled\ncompartments AMSA accepts grain surfaces in which the height between the\nhighest peaks and the lowest troughs in the compartment is not more than 1.0m\nas being \u201clevel\u201d within the meaning of the Code and therefore trimmed to an\nacceptable level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. It is the\nresponsibility of the Master to ensure that the cargo is trimmed as required by\nthe Code - AMSA will not determine the method by which this is achieved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Vw8Xrm1oXi8/WFcbfpnjAWI/AAAAAAABPxg/a3m3iS5eAQEWukjKYA-dwi6Zyn4hHz2lQCLcB/s1600/cargo_hold_cleanKing_high_res.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Vw8Xrm1oXi8/WFcbfpnjAWI/AAAAAAABPxg/a3m3iS5eAQEWukjKYA-dwi6Zyn4hHz2lQCLcB/s640/cargo_hold_cleanKing_high_res.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CALCULATION OF\nSTABILITY FOR SHIPS CARRYING BULK GRAIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">G \u2013 A<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INSTRUCTIONS TO MASTER\nFOR LOADING GRAIN IN AUSTRALIAN PORTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chapter VI of SOLAS 74,\nas amended, requires the shipper to provide the master or his representative\nwith appropriate information on the cargo. Beyond this, it is the master\u2019s\nresponsibility to take precautions for the proper stowage of the cargo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chapter VI further\nrequires a cargo ship carrying grain to comply with the International Grain\nCode (\u201cCode\u201d) and to have a document of authorization as required by that Code.\nGrain cargoes are generally loaded within the limitations of the vessel\u2019s\nDocument of Authorization and the approved Grain Loading Manual. A ship without\nsuch documents is required to satisfy AMSA and its flag State that the ship\ncomplies with the Code in its proposed loading condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Precautions for the\nproper stowage of the cargo include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 obtaining from the\nlocal agent or other authoritative source at the loading port, the quantity of,\nand accurate stowage factor for, the grain to be loaded and trimming methods\navailable;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 cargo planning should\nallow for the possibility that the actual stowage factor could vary\nsubstantially from that expected;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 calculations of\nstability and shear force / bending moments for all conditions of loading and\nall stages of the voyage while carrying grain, from commencement of loading to\narrival at the last port of discharge. These calculations should demonstrate\ncompliance with the Code and all relevant statutory and classification society\nrequirements. Please note that this form requires the stability to be\ncalculated for the worst condition that can occur during the voyage;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 ensuring that all\ncargo space bilge wells are clean, suctions clear and pumping arrangements\noperating satisfactorily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 ensuring bilge well\ncovers have sufficient holes for drainage and, after pre-loading inspection by\nshore-based personnel, are covered with burlap or similar material to allow\ndrainage while preventing loss of grain into the wells;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 ensuring that any\nnecessary portable fittings and/or hinged partitions are securely erected and\nmade suitably grain-tight, and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 ensuring that all\nlight fittings, and other electrical circuits not required for the safe\noperation of the ship, within the cargo space are isolated from the power\nsource.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMSA requires the\nfollowing interpretations to be followed in relation to compliance with the\nCode:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 the Code requires all\ncompartments in which grain is stowed to be either \u201cfilled\u201d (trimmed or\nuntrimmed) or \u201cpartly filled\u201d (trimmed only). AMSA does not accept \u201cpartly\nfilled\u201d compartments untrimmed, even if data for these is approved by the flag\nState Administration, as they are not provided for in the Code;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 AMSA cannot accept a\ncompartment as being \u201cfilled\u201d if the average ullage at the coaming exceeds the\nminimum required to accommodate the structure of hatch covers or 100mm,\nwhichever is greater;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 untrimmed moments may\nonly be used for filled compartments;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 calculations for any\nfilled compartment are to be based on the full (ie. 100% cubic) capacity and\ncorresponding maximum VCG of the compartment irrespective of whether the cargo\nis to be trimmed or untrimmed;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 AMSA accepts grain\nsurfaces in which the height between the highest peaks and the lowest troughs\nin the compartment is not more than 1.0m as being \u201clevel\u201d within the meaning of\nthe Code and therefore trimmed to an acceptable standard;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 the surface of grain\ncargo in each partly filled compartment is to be evenly distributed and not\nused to remove a list;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 it is the\nresponsibility of the master to ensure that the cargo is trimmed as required by\nthe Code - AMSA will not determine the method by which this is achieved, and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 any list (heel) is to\nbe corrected before the vessel sails.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMSA has no objection\nto the engagement of a consultant or supercargo to assist ship\u2019s personnel in\nachieving compliance with the above requirements. However, if inspection by an\nAMSA surveyor reveals non-compliance with these requirements, it may be\nnecessary for AMSA to insist on rectification, the possible engagement of a\nconsultant or the implementation of the control provisions of STCW\u201995.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.amsa.gov.au/forms-and-publications/AMSA226.pdf\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">https://www.amsa.gov.au/forms-and-publications/AMSA226.pdf</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BpGk3qDtP7g/WFcbz47gfgI/AAAAAAABPxk/Sk0sTGuWh1IEs_4DoFOcMtpJI0lYTQqKQCLcB/s1600/ph_0EE106_01.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BpGk3qDtP7g/WFcbz47gfgI/AAAAAAABPxk/Sk0sTGuWh1IEs_4DoFOcMtpJI0lYTQqKQCLcB/s640/ph_0EE106_01.jpg\" width=\"584\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AcDqGy18iXE/WFcRir2VfSI/AAAAAAABPvc/Zt-_oACYtFIQpF1lsnAAuyfRwoZb4c1JgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AcDqGy18iXE/WFcRir2VfSI/AAAAAAABPvc/Zt-_oACYtFIQpF1lsnAAuyfRwoZb4c1JgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B4.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9r6m4HUl0l0/WFccOY1gKWI/AAAAAAABPxo/5BwN08M0PMUXd9Dfdr-sqaKXJxD3N8wfQCLcB/s1600/Screen-shotW-2013-02-14-at-4.15.08-PM.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9r6m4HUl0l0/WFccOY1gKWI/AAAAAAABPxo/5BwN08M0PMUXd9Dfdr-sqaKXJxD3N8wfQCLcB/s640/Screen-shotW-2013-02-14-at-4.15.08-PM.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5I0-lI1dr3Q/WFcRpjTkfRI/AAAAAAABPvg/r7nJD2Km4Bow3CCbLPm6q5qTjQQ0fILJgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B1%2B-%2BCopy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5I0-lI1dr3Q/WFcRpjTkfRI/AAAAAAABPvg/r7nJD2Km4Bow3CCbLPm6q5qTjQQ0fILJgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B1%2B-%2BCopy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l3ZH65QM9qk/WFcRwFry25I/AAAAAAABPvk/pXAGirP32usnUovuNmrTZSm9gz2Za--LgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B1%2B-%2BCopy%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l3ZH65QM9qk/WFcRwFry25I/AAAAAAABPvk/pXAGirP32usnUovuNmrTZSm9gz2Za--LgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B1%2B-%2BCopy%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0LmZ5yuOa4Y/WFcR4A1s40I/AAAAAAABPvo/embbxFq7Qh4YRNr97jATFsNtEn19tywSQCLcB/s1600/grain%2B2%2B-%2BCopy%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0LmZ5yuOa4Y/WFcR4A1s40I/AAAAAAABPvo/embbxFq7Qh4YRNr97jATFsNtEn19tywSQCLcB/s1600/grain%2B2%2B-%2BCopy%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O7MrKcIF-aE/WFcSCMQsOOI/AAAAAAABPvs/iqL4TMGeQOI50-Xly-1ZdwCkHzVJEdHfgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B2%2B-%2BCopy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O7MrKcIF-aE/WFcSCMQsOOI/AAAAAAABPvs/iqL4TMGeQOI50-Xly-1ZdwCkHzVJEdHfgCLcB/s1600/grain%2B2%2B-%2BCopy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FaHBzhg6Lj8/WFcSMnUkRHI/AAAAAAABPv0/vzBisMPZMxER-41HCd-Ti5fQkBERdI0ywCLcB/s1600/grain%2B3%2B-%2BCopy%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FaHBzhg6Lj8/WFcSMnUkRHI/AAAAAAABPv0/vzBisMPZMxER-41HCd-Ti5fQkBERdI0ywCLcB/s1600/grain%2B3%2B-%2BCopy%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0wFFOGbh3KA/WFcSVs2hJRI/AAAAAAABPv4/ABo8Qz6f50QKja8vP_Db6p98UxS6D7JrACLcB/s1600/grain%2B3%2B-%2BCopy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0wFFOGbh3KA/WFcSVs2hJRI/AAAAAAABPv4/ABo8Qz6f50QKja8vP_Db6p98UxS6D7JrACLcB/s1600/grain%2B3%2B-%2BCopy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bBJfwb8Zeyo/WFcdRZnME7I/AAAAAAABPx0/nFhR20nHuqksA01u-ds2r4erO4S7OJo4ACLcB/s1600/slid55e_6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"215\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bBJfwb8Zeyo/WFcdRZnME7I/AAAAAAABPx0/nFhR20nHuqksA01u-ds2r4erO4S7OJo4ACLcB/s400/slid55e_6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simpson\u2019s rules are used\nto calculate the area, volume and geometric centre of the space enclosed by a straight\nline and a curve<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Simpson's 1st rule</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also known as the 1-4-1\nrule (after the multipliers used )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><img alt=\"{\\displaystyle Area={\\frac {h}{3}}(a+4b+c)}\" src=\"https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/454cd8d54d746789ce56385ae5f4b97e01ad47a2\" /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h7ZWUccMEk4/WFe3rYtsRdI/AAAAAAABPzE/r73rg-EAIu4EwVtEiyARaKCgYqTNopM0QCLcB/s1600/Simpso88nrule1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h7ZWUccMEk4/WFe3rYtsRdI/AAAAAAABPzE/r73rg-EAIu4EwVtEiyARaKCgYqTNopM0QCLcB/s400/Simpso88nrule1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vG3_z1eKUq4/WFe1QdTIXxI/AAAAAAABPyw/862zTwRTgK8B1-HdcNumwWOx7w4ZwRQPQCLcB/s1600/stab%2B2%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"206\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vG3_z1eKUq4/WFe1QdTIXxI/AAAAAAABPyw/862zTwRTgK8B1-HdcNumwWOx7w4ZwRQPQCLcB/s640/stab%2B2%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Simpson's 2nd rule</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also known as the\n1-3-3-1 rule, Simpson's second rule is a simplified version of Simpson's 3/8\nrule.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><img alt=\"{\\displaystyle Area={\\frac {3h}{8}}(a+3b+3c+d)}\" src=\"https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/66810d9846fe92e77d9c0115145bb34e32670d6c\" /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aU7qK4AtrEc/WFe3fHbiYKI/AAAAAAABPzA/zyVe6jEO4S0S20dlBp3D0Jswym9zxCk4gCLcB/s1600/SimpsoRRn2rule.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"230\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aU7qK4AtrEc/WFe3fHbiYKI/AAAAAAABPzA/zyVe6jEO4S0S20dlBp3D0Jswym9zxCk4gCLcB/s400/SimpsoRRn2rule.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Simpson's 3rd rule</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also known as the 5 - 8\n-1 rule<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><img alt=\"Area={\\frac  {h}{12}}(5a+8b-c)\" src=\"https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/bd937f2d9e64ae903681878788912db5c65e1082\" /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ewQHCBeyjg0/WFe1Un67WYI/AAAAAAABPy0/6hce_TPuF7Qv2kdGuDeaQg0m4qSu9dsLgCLcB/s1600/stab%2B2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; none;\">December 18, 2016 at 1:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_99MC\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BRIAN ACTON ( STANFORD ) WAS A COMPUTER PROGRAMMER LIKE MY ELDER SON ( CORNELL )</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">HE APPLIED TO FACEBOOK FOR A JOB</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">FACEBOOK REJECTED HIM IN 2009</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">LATER HE CREATED HIS OWN COMPANY WHATSAPP AND SOLD IT TO FACEBOOK FOR 19 BILLION USD</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THIS IS A MESSAGE TO MY READERS -- ONLY YOU CAN REJECT YOURSELF, WHEN YOU ARE LIBERATED</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN YOU ARE LIBERATED ONLY YOU CAN DECIDE WHAT YOU ARE WORTH- NOT OTHERS .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MANY PEOPLE HAVE ASKED ME --IF YOU ARE SUCH A NATIONALIST, WHY HAVE YOU SENT YOUR SON TO CORNELL</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ANSWER: TO GRADE HIMSELF-- TO FIND OUT WHAT HE IS WORTH AMONG THE BEST BRAINS ON THE PLANET. CORNELL HAS PRODUCED MAXIMUM NOBEL PRIZE WINNERS ( TECHNICAL ).</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CORNELLS ALSO HAS MAXIMUM SUICIDES ON THE PLANET -IN THE COMPUTER SCIENCE STRAIN.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">KABIR BEDIs SON COMMITTED SUICIDE, AS AN UNDERGRADUATE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE AT CARNEGIE MELON.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS . THE PRESSURE IS TOO MUCH.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN MY ELDER SON PASSED OUT OF CORNELL , HE APPLIED TO ONE COMPANY IN THE TOP 3 .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">AFTER HIS CODING TEST - THEY SENT AN EMAIL \" YOUR CODING ABILITY IS OUTSTANDING. WHAT EVERY PREVIOUS CANDIDATE TILL NOW HAVE TAKEN PAGES AND HOURS--YOU DID IT IN JUST 4 LINES -- YOUR CODE CANT BE SURPASSED EVER ON THIS PLANET \"</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY SON JOINED ANOTHER COMPANY-- FREE CHOICE</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/my-son-at-cornell-university-capt-ajit_25.html</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN THE POST ABOVE I TALK ABOUT A PROJECT COMPETITION AT CORNELL , WHERE MY SON AND HIS SOUTH KOREAN PARTNER GOT SILVER.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THEY SURRENDERED THE GOLD BECAUSE THEY BOTH VOTED FOR THE WINNERS --WHO SELFISHLY VOTED FROM THEMSELVES. ALL STUDENTS KNEW THIS -AND THEY BECAME THE \"POPULAR WINNERS\"..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHAT IMPRESSED ALL , WAS BECAUSE MY SON WAS A COMPUTER MASTERS STUDENT WHILE HIS KOREAN PARTNER WAS A ELECTRICAL MASTERS STUDENT.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY SON DID THE JOINT PROJECT IN C++ WHILE THE KOREAN DID IT IN MATLAB.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE COMPUTER VISION PROJECT WAS DECIDED BETWEEN THEMSELVES --DETECTING HUMAN FORMS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THEY GAVE IT AWAY FREE AS STUDENTS - WHILE TODAY IT MUST BE WORTH SEVERAL BILLION DOLLARS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BOTH REACHED THE FINAL GOAL AFTER TRAVERSING MENTALLY ON TOTALLY DIFFERENT PATHWAYS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">AND THEN THEY GAVE THE PROS AND CONS OF BOTH PATHS -- AND THIS IMPRESSED ALL .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A COMPUTER SCIENCE STUDENT AND AN ELECTRICAL STUDENT SEEING EYE TO EYE .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bu5PvGxPAZo</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">REMEMBER-- REJECTION IS COMMONPLACE IN MODERN LIFE..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">REJECTION DOES NOT MEAN THAT YOU AINT NO GOOD- IT JUST MEANS THE OTHER GUY FAILED TO NOTICE WHAT YOU ARE WORTH --</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">--MOSTLY BECAUSE HE WAS NOT WORTHY ENOUGH TO GAUGE YOUR INHERENT WORTH</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 17.6px;\">every time you get rejected -- holler&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\"&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">NEXT</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">&nbsp;!\"</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div I WONT ASK YOU ANYTHING<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WOULD BE TOTALLY STUNNED .<br />\n<br />\nINDEED MY METHOD BORE FRUIT-- <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;I SELECTED THE BEST \"ON THEIR TERMS\" -- NOT MINE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br />I DID NOT ALLOW \"LACK OF COMPETENCE IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE \" AFFECT THEIR CHANCES .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE EAST EUROPEANS, WHO WERE MORE COMPETENT THAN THEIR WESTERN COUNTERPARTS WERE MOST GRATEFUL-- NAY --TOUCHED .<br />\n<br />\nCHOOTS WHO DONT UNDERSTAND THE SUBJECT ALWAYS ASK STUPID QUESTIONS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-magnetised-pv-valves-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST ABOVE , I PROVE THAT I HAVE DONE MORE FOR CLIMATE CHANGE THAN AL FUCKIN' GORE ...<br />\n<br />\nCHOOTS CAN NOT EVEN UNDERSTAND , THE HUGE WORLD IMPACT OF THE POST.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE COMMENTS COLUMN A WHITE SKINNED SCANDINAVIAN ( BIG BOSS OF A HARDWARE COMPANY ) APPRECIATES WHAT I WROTE AND SAYS-- HE HAS UNDERSTOOD WHAT I HAVE WRITTEN AND HE HAS ADDRESSED IT AGAINST ALL ODDS..<br />\n<br />\nI TELL MY READERS THIS -- AT SEA I WAS A THINKER AND A MASTER IMPLEMENTER<br />\n<br />\nTODAY I AM RETIRED -- I JUST THINK.<br />\n<br />\nMY READERS HAVE TO IMPLEMENT.<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: By the way NO regulation allows methanol spray with SCBA IBC sets. IBC sets are not for working in the literal sense. \" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift. Fill up a form in capital does NOT mean you have to take a flight to the capital city of your country. SCBA sets are for emergencies and must be donned by two sailors.UNQUOTE<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS \"<span style=\"color: blue;\">WORKING TIME / LUNG DEMAND TIME</span>\" THINGY HAS NOW BEEN UNDERSTOOD BY THE POWERS AT SEA.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE WISDOM OF NOT HAVING TO TAKING A FLIGHT TO NEW DELHI TO FILL UP A MANGY FORM \"IN CAPITAL\" HAS BEEN GRASPED.</span><br />\n<br />\nGOD MUST LOVE STUPID PEOPLE-- HE MADE SO MANY- MOST OF THEM ARE BOSSES-- FOR SHEER ABILITY TO COMPROMISE.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. He must drink a glass of hot black coffee ,\nwith a table spoon of desi ghee in it \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">While going back home I\nasked my father -UGGGHHHH why ghee ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said \" It is a\nchelating agent. You must have seen the gurikkal also has a bowl of fresh\nturmeric paste at his side -- that is also a chelating agent.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS YOU GET\nNICKED BY A URUMI, YOU GO HOME AND DIE . UNLESS THE TOXIC METAL IS EXCRETED BY\nCHELATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I joined the sea,\nmy Chief Officer asked me to paint the bare railings RED LEAD ( primer ) using\na POTHA ( hand held rag ) instead of a slower paint brush.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; EDTA is used to keep condensed milk from thickening. It acts as\nan antioxidant to keep packaged meat from turning brown due to contact with\noxygen.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A form of EDTA called\niron EDTA is sometimes used to increase the amount of iron found in grain-based\nproducts, including cereal bars and ready-to-eat breakfast cereals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Any fortified grain products may contain EDTA,\nas it helps stabilize vitamins. EDTA can work with other antioxidants in foods\nto help keep oils and fats stable and limit spoilage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mayonnaise, margarine,\nsandwich spreads and salad dressing contain EDTA to keep them from spoiling and\npreserve their flavor, and it helps maintain the flavor and carbonation of soft\ndrinks without mention on the label.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-63wqNrD_GZg/WFTjqn91T7I/AAAAAAABPtQ/DSFXVGb3014LPhlw-8N3cWtMv6NczYWnACLcB/s1600/rrphoto-42-e1398806573384.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"634\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-63wqNrD_GZg/WFTjqn91T7I/AAAAAAABPtQ/DSFXVGb3014LPhlw-8N3cWtMv6NczYWnACLcB/s640/rrphoto-42-e1398806573384.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium Disodium EDTA\n(Ethylenediaminetetraacetic Acid) is a very harmful chemical found in many\nhousehold foods and beverages. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This has severe side\neffects . The, the chemical builds up in the body, causing toxicity after\nlong-term use. &nbsp; Calcium Disodium EDTA is a chemical created from the combination\nof Formaldehyde, Sodium Cyanide, and Ethylene Diamine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EDTA (molar mass 292.3 g) is a colorless\ncrystalline material which decomposes when heated to above 240\u00b0C. &nbsp; It is only\nslightly soluble in water. &nbsp; However, its sodium salts are quite soluble in\nwater.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The commercial preparation involves the reaction of ethylenediamine,\nformaldehyde (HCHO), and sodium cyanide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">H2N-CH2-CH2-NH2 + HCHO + NaCN&nbsp;&nbsp; (Na+\u00afOCOCH2)2N-CH2-CH2-N(CH2COO\u00afNa+)2</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; AFTER THAT HE GAVE THESE GIRLS ENEMA HIMSELF. WHEN YOUR GUT IS IMBALANCED YOU GO MAD.<br />\n<br />\nThe primary benefit that they GOOD BACTERIA provide is protection against BAD BACTERIA that try to establish and infection and invade the cells that line the internal intestinal wall.<br />\n<br />\nAbout a third of all bacteria in the gut are members of the Bacteroides species. Other species that are represented include Lactobacillus, the bacteria commonly used in probiotic foods such as live yoghurt, Escherichia species, such as E. coli, some Clostridium bacteria, the Fusobacteria, the Eubacteria, members of the Bifidobacteria group and lesser known species such as Peptostreptococcus, Ruminococcus and Peptococcus.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/probiotics-prebiotics-friendly-gut.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/no-farting-please-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe best estimates put the actual number of bacterial cells in the digestive system at any one time at about 100 trillion. The number of individual species is more than 800. The majority probably belong to about 50 species.<br />\n<br />\nFriendly bacteria may not harm the digestive system, but it is a surprise that the digestive system does not manage to harm them. It is full of powerful enzymes and the mechanism of peristalsis constantly moves the contents of the intestines forwards towards the rectum and anus.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU REMOVE BACTERIA BY ENEMA TWICE A DAY, YOU GET HOOKED ON. &nbsp; &nbsp; GANDHI WAS GIVEN AN ENEMA KIT BY JEW ROTHSHILDs AGENT.<br />\n<br />\nFriendly bacteria of the gut appear to the body's immune system as cells of the digestive system. Bacteroides species coat themselves with an outer layer composed of sugar molecules that the bacteria remove from the surface of cells that line the large intestine<br />\n<br />\nThis special coating helps disguise the bacteria and hide them from the immune system, which would otherwise see them as foreign invading bacteria and try to get rid of them. This mechanism allows Bacteroides bacteria to live in the digestive system unchallenged by antibodies or immune cells.<br />\n<br />\nSome species of bacteria in the digestive system make vitamin K and vitamins from the B group \u2013 which are difficult to obtain from food and cannot be manufactured by humans.<br />\n<br />\nAs well as their helpful effects in maintaining an optimum pH and stimulating the immune system, friendly gut bacteria may also help in breaking down drugs, hormones that are not needed any more, and environmental substances that have the potential to be cancer-causing.<br />\n<br />\nAs the bacteria that live in the human gut are beneficial to their host, and the bacteria enjoy a safe environment to live, the relationship that we have with these tiny organisms is described as symbiosis or mutualism.<br />\n<br />\nJEWS WHO SHIT THROUGH FIVE ASSHOLES ( CHRONS) MUST KNOW THIS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>AYURVEDA MADE SURE, FRIENDLY BACTERIA FLORA IN THE GUT IS NEVER UPSET. &nbsp; Even though there are limited approved indications for the use of chelators, they are often advertised as treatments for numerous other conditions by rogue doctors .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Many of these expensive, lengthy \"treatments\" are administered directly into the bloodstream (intravenous, IV)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Chelation therapy is a treatment for heavy metal poisoning: iron, mercury, arsenic, and lead. Purported uses include:&nbsp; treating damaged arteries (atherosclerosis) by removing calcium from arterial plaques, treating intermittent claudication (painful leg cramps due to arteriosclerosis [narrowed arteries], curing Alzhiemers&nbsp; though there is NO evidence that this is possible or effective<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The rogue doctors use EDTA for curing autism, though there is no evidence that metals are a cause of autism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">EDTA&nbsp; chelation therapy have resulted in extreme harm, even death. This is an unacceptable risk in the absence of proven benefit. Several unapproved \"chelators\" are marketed for home use. The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) recently warned several companies that they are breaking the law by marketing such \"therapies\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There is NO&nbsp; credible evidence that circulating chelators actually reach the calcium in arterial plaques. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Rogue doctors say that benefits of using EDTA chelation therapy in patients with coronary artery disease include decreasing the ability of platelets to clot, reducing free radicals which cause cell damage, and lowering iron and cholesterol in the blood stream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Chelation therapy as a treatment for autism is based on the erroneous belief that mercury in childhood vaccines is a cause of autism. Since researchers believe that metals are involved in some way with the development of Alzheimer's disease, some chelation practitioners recommend courses of chelation therapy for these patients.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This may sound intuitive, but the reality is that available chelators cannot work in the brain. The protective \"blood-brain barrier\" will allow only the smallest of particles to leave the bloodstream and enter brain tissue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Currently-available chelating drugs circulate in the bloodstream but they are unable to cross the blood-brain barrier, making them useless for decreasing the amount of metals in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">HARDLY ANYBODY TALKS ABOUT NANO CARBON BREACHING THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER..&nbsp; THEY ARE TOO BUSY SAVING THE DEAD US CAR CITY OF DETROIT.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/interstitial-lung-disease-nano-carbon.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/interstitial-lung-disease-nano-carbon.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_99M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/edta-chelation-therapy-stop-using.html?showComment=1482046690937#c7923806297063982725\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 18, 2016 at 1:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_99MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nBRIAN ACTON ( STANFORD ) WAS A COMPUTER PROGRAMMER LIKE MY ELDER SON ( CORNELL )<br /><br />HE APPLIED TO FACEBOOK FOR A JOB<br /><br />FACEBOOK REJECTED HIM IN 2009<br /><br />LATER HE CREATED HIS OWN COMPANY WHATSAPP AND SOLD IT TO FACEBOOK FOR 19 BILLION USD<br /><br />THIS IS A MESSAGE TO MY READERS -- ONLY YOU CAN REJECT YOURSELF, WHEN YOU ARE LIBERATED<br /><br />WHEN YOU ARE LIBERATED ONLY YOU CAN DECIDE WHAT YOU ARE WORTH- NOT OTHERS .<br /><br />MANY PEOPLE HAVE ASKED ME --IF YOU ARE SUCH A NATIONALIST, WHY HAVE YOU SENT YOUR SON TO CORNELL<br /><br />ANSWER: TO GRADE HIMSELF-- TO FIND OUT WHAT HE IS WORTH AMONG THE BEST BRAINS ON THE PLANET. CORNELL HAS PRODUCED MAXIMUM NOBEL PRIZE WINNERS ( TECHNICAL ).<br /><br />CORNELLS ALSO HAS MAXIMUM SUICIDES ON THE PLANET -IN THE COMPUTER SCIENCE STRAIN.<br /><br />KABIR BEDIs SON COMMITTED SUICIDE, AS AN UNDERGRADUATE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE AT CARNEGIE MELON.<br /><br />I KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS . THE PRESSURE IS TOO MUCH.<br /><br />WHEN MY ELDER SON PASSED OUT OF CORNELL , HE APPLIED TO ONE COMPANY IN THE TOP 3 .<br /><br />AFTER HIS CODING TEST - THEY SENT AN EMAIL \" YOUR CODING ABILITY IS OUTSTANDING. WHAT EVERY PREVIOUS CANDIDATE TILL NOW HAVE TAKEN PAGES AND HOURS--YOU DID IT IN JUST 4 LINES -- YOUR CODE CANT BE SURPASSED EVER ON THIS PLANET \"<br /><br />MY SON JOINED ANOTHER COMPANY-- FREE CHOICE<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/my-son-at-cornell-university-capt-ajit_25.html<br /><br />IN THE POST ABOVE I TALK ABOUT A PROJECT COMPETITION AT CORNELL , WHERE MY SON AND HIS SOUTH KOREAN PARTNER GOT SILVER.<br /><br />THEY SURRENDERED THE GOLD BECAUSE THEY BOTH VOTED FOR THE WINNERS --WHO SELFISHLY VOTED FROM THEMSELVES. ALL STUDENTS KNEW THIS -AND THEY BECAME THE \"POPULAR WINNERS\"..<br /><br />WHAT IMPRESSED ALL , WAS BECAUSE MY SON WAS A COMPUTER MASTERS STUDENT WHILE HIS KOREAN PARTNER WAS A ELECTRICAL MASTERS STUDENT.<br /><br />MY SON DID THE JOINT PROJECT IN C++ WHILE THE KOREAN DID IT IN MATLAB.<br /><br />THE COMPUTER VISION PROJECT WAS DECIDED BETWEEN THEMSELVES --DETECTING HUMAN FORMS.<br /><br />THEY GAVE IT AWAY FREE AS STUDENTS - WHILE TODAY IT MUST BE WORTH SEVERAL BILLION DOLLARS.<br /><br />BOTH REACHED THE FINAL GOAL AFTER TRAVERSING MENTALLY ON TOTALLY DIFFERENT PATHWAYS.<br /><br />AND THEN THEY GAVE THE PROS AND CONS OF BOTH PATHS -- AND THIS IMPRESSED ALL .<br /><br />A COMPUTER SCIENCE STUDENT AND AN ELECTRICAL STUDENT SEEING EYE TO EYE .<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bu5PvGxPAZo<br /><br />REMEMBER-- REJECTION IS COMMONPLACE IN MODERN LIFE..<br /><br />REJECTION DOES NOT MEAN THAT YOU AINT NO GOOD- IT JUST MEANS THE OTHER GUY FAILED TO NOTICE WHAT YOU ARE WORTH --<br /><br />--MOSTLY BECAUSE HE WAS NOT WORTHY ENOUGH TO GAUGE YOUR INHERENT WORTH<br /><br /><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">every time you get rejected -- holler </span>\" <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NEXT</span></b> !\"</span><br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6636880656650484669\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; SHE IS MORE POLITICALLY CORRECT THAN ME.<br />\n<br />\nAT EVERY SINGLE OPPORTUNITY DEEPA MALIK LAYS IT HAJAAAAR THICK.<br />\n<br />\nQUINTESSENTIAL PNJAAAABI ARMY WIFE --WHO DREAMS OF KNEDAAA ..<br />\n<br />\nIT ALL ABOUT HERSELF AND HER HUMONGOUS \"SPIRIT \" WHICH COULD GIVE CHE GUEVARA A INFERIORITY COMPLEX --IN HIS GRAVE<br />\n<br />\nONE OR TWICE IT IS OK-- BUT YOU CANT HAVE THIS SHIT EVERY SINGLE DAY.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/spirit-and-che-guevara-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI DARE THIS WOMAN DEEPA MALIK TO HAVE A SHOTPUT COMPETITION WITH MY WIFE .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A SPECIAL OR NONSPECIAL WOMAN SITS ON A WHEEL CHAIR, THE EQUATION IS THE SAME. PLAYING FIELD GETS LEVELLED.<br />\n<br />\nonce myself and my wife was armtwisted by my elder son's school headmaster , to come for the sports day--<br />\n<br />\n--according to this muslim headmaster, my wife was the most respected and worthy parent .<br />\n<br />\nso i was around doing the medical bit ( i am certified as a ship captain ) ... all attractive school girls over the age of 15 developed some medical problem or other .<br />\n<br />\nthe cardiologist ( my elder son's class mate's father ) with me said \"ajit, they are faking it-- they just want attention, --we in the medical profession know what this type of malingering is -- just play along -let it be \"<br />\n<br />\nanyway time came for mother parents sports event.<br />\n<br />\nfemale teachers arm twisted my wife to participate in shot put.<br />\n<br />\nso she gave my two year old younger son to me.<br />\n<br />\nhe was a heavy child.<br />\n<br />\ntoday he is 126 kg--the strongest in the gym, -- brute strength--yet very soft hearted , without ego.<br />\n<br />\nanyways to cut a long story short--my wife threw the shot- almost 4 times further than the 2nd placed mother.<br />\n<br />\nALL STARTED LAUGHING -- EVEN MY WIFE STARTED LAUGHING .<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS SO GODDAMN FUNNY. &nbsp; A THIN FRAIL WOMAN , SO STRONG.. AND THEY ALL LOOKED AT MY HUGE 2 YEAR OLD BABY GLARING AT THEM.<br />\n<br />\nEVERYBODY AROUND CAME RUSHING TO FIND OUT WHY ALL ARE LAUGHING LOUDLY -- AND THEY ALSO STARTED LAUGHING<br />\n<br />\nmy wife's shoulders were strong --carrying a heavy baby.<br />\n<br />\nmy wife can kick anybody's ass. she won first prize on my ship among young sailors for the high kick .<br />\n<br />\nTHAT TIME TOO ALL STARTED LAUGHING LOUDLY.<br />\n<br />\ncheck out the picture of my wife kicking high-- last photo<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/equator-crossing-ceremony-at-sea-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedFXbBD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedFXbBD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/donald-trump-for-president-part-10-capt.html?showComment=1481894173363#c5293675020575867358\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 16, 2016 at 6:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_30MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHIS BLOGSITE ASKS DONALD TRUMP--<br />\n<br />\nEXPOSE JEW ROTHSCHILD AND HIS AGENTS -- THE CLIMATE CHANGE HOAX PERPETRATORS POINTING FINGERS AT MAN MADE CO2<br />\n<br />\nTELL THESE IGNORANT BASTARDS THAT CARBON DI OXIDE SUSTAINS LIFE ON PLANET EARTH<br />\n<br />\nTRUMP-- SHOW THAT YOU HAVE BALLS BETWEEN YOUR LEGS<br />\n<br />\nWE ask you to pull the United States out of this VESTED global kosher deal to curb emissions of carbon dioxide.<br />\n<br />\nMethane and Nitrous oxide must be addressed --not man made CO2.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCarbon Dioxide (CO2) is a natural constituent of the atmosphere with a density of 747 mg per cubic meter of air. Its concentration in the composition of air is roughly 0.032%; however, of all the organic compounds, carbon dioxide is by far the most important one for the sustainability of the biosphere (the whole of life on Earth).<br />\n<br />\nWithout CO2 the life of photosynthetic organisms and animals would be impossible, given that CO2 provides the basis for the synthesis of organic compounds that provide nutrients for plants and animals.<br />\n<br />\nThrough photosynthesis, organisms with chlorophyll take in atmospheric CO2 or dissolve CO2 in water to form more complex molecules, such as carbohydrates, lipids, proteins and nucleic acids<br />\n<br />\nAn organism with chlorophyll absorbs light, CO2 and water from its surrounding environment. The water molecule is broken and the Hydrogen molecule bonds with carbon dioxide molecules to form glucose. Oxygen from the water molecule is released to the atmosphere, whereas the energy provided by photons is stored in the bonds of the glucose molecule.<br />\n<br />\nAny nutritional chain begins with producer organisms; that is, with those organisms that produce their own food. These organisms are called autotrophs. Plants are autotrophs because they produce their own food; the raw materials for photosynthesis are water, carbon dioxide and light.<br />\n<br />\nIt has been determined experimentally that the density of carbon dioxide needed for the optimal development of all kinds of plants is 895 mg per cubic meter of air (about 500 ppmv).<br />\n<br />\nCertain plants grow much better in atmospheres with very high densities of carbon dioxide; for example, the pteridophyte and certain species of conifers develop more successfully in humid atmospheres with 5000 ppmv of carbon dioxide.<br />\n<br />\nCarbon Dioxide is not an environmental polluting agent because it is not detrimental or poisonous to life. Carbon dioxide cannot kill living cells by altering their structure or physiology in the same way, for example, as a snake venom will. It can only suffocate an organism when Oxygen is not present at a sufficient concentration to sustain life.<br />\n<br />\nThe difference between carbon dioxide and carbon monoxide is one less oxygen atom in the molecule of carbon monoxide. This small difference renders carbon monoxide toxic and carbon dioxide vital.<br />\n<br />\nIf you was to lock yourself in an air tight room and light a stove (NEVER DO IT!), it would not be the carbon dioxide that kills you, but poisoning by carbon monoxide and asphyxia from the depletion of oxygen consumed by the burning stove.<br />\n<br />\nIf carbon dioxide was to accumulate in the same room to a density of 5 grams per cubic meter of air (3078 ppmv) you would not be asphyxiated, providing the density of oxygen in the room remained stable.<br />\n<br />\nLike water, CO2 is vital for life on Earth; thus, CO2 is not a pollutant or contaminant.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCO2 densities have increased to more than 4000 ppmv in some geological eras, for example, during the Ordovician Period. When CO2 in the terrestrial atmosphere has reached densities this high in the past, life flourished abundantly. Consequently, we cannot consider such a high concentration of atmospheric CO2 as \"pollution\".<br />\n<br />\nGreater the density of CO2 in a given environment, the greater will be the production of food for plants and of the animals that feed on them.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
