spreading atmospheric methane global warming veil is raising the temperature of the lower atmosphere many times faster than carbon dioxide does, causing the extreme summer temperatures<br />\n<br />\nIn 2016, the Arctic ice cap has melted and the Arctic sea has been aggressively heated by the sun and the Gulf Stream.<br />\n<br />\nFRACKING IN USA AFFECTS INDIAs SURVIVAL ( MONSOONS )<br />\n<br />\nGas fracking is in the process of destroying the entire aquifer systems of the United States and causing widespread earthquakes.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gulf Stream carries huge quantities of heat into the Arctic Ocean where it is destabilizing subsea methane hydrates releasing vast volumes of methane into the Arctic atmosphere.<br />\n<br />\nMethane formed by organisms in the water becomes trapped in the fabric of water ice crystals when it freezes and WAS stable below about 300 meters depth in the Arctic Ocean-- NOT ANY MORE !<br />\n<br />\nThere are giant reservoirs of mantle methane, originally sealed in by shallow methane hydrate plugs in fractures cutting the Arctic seafloor .<br />\n<br />\nGlobal warming has heated up the oceanic currents fed by the Gulf Stream flowing into the Arctic, causing massive destabilization of the subsea methane hydrates and fault seals and releasing increasing volumes of methane directly into the atmosphere<br />\n<br />\nSuch a huge Arctic temperature anomaly can only be produced by methane with an apparent Methane Global Warming Potential (GWP) of around 2000 times ( TWO THOUSAND TIMES ) that of carbon dioxide.<br />\n<br />\nThis is a combined GWP that takes account of a large number of feedbacks caused by other additional methane heating.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gulf Stream flowing past the east coast of USA follows the southern shelf edge of the Arctic Eurasian Basin to the Laptev Sea, its central hot (+2\u00b0C) core zone at 300 meters depth destabilizing the subsea Arctic methane hydrates en route and releasing ever increasing amounts of methane into the Arctic atmosphere<br />\n<br />\nThe North Atlantic gulf stream area has the largest zone of high salinity on Earth due to extreme evaporation .<br />\n<br />\nThe spectacular rates of heat loss from the Gulf Stream waters off the coast of the United States can be clearly followed north east to Norway, where they split into the eastern Yermack branch entering the Barents Sea and the West Spitzbergen (Svalbard) Current which dives beneath the floating Arctic Ice Cap .<br />\n<br />\nThe ocean current conveyor system cannot be decimated by ONE nations greed .<br />\n<br />\nRising arctic methane emissions are spread by VORTICES to form an anomalously dense build up of methane in the atmosphere generating a continuously thickening Methane Global Warming Veil now almost enveloping the entire Earth<br />\n<br />\nFRACKING MUST STOP IN USA-- METHANE IS A TIME BOMB.<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW INDIA HAS BEEN ARMTWISTED TO BUT FRACKED METHANE FROM USA --WITH A NOBEL PRIZE ON STICK FOR APCO MODI.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO REASON WHY INDIA SHOULD BUT SHALE FRACKED GAS FROM HALFWAY AROUND THIS PLANET<br />\n<br />\nWe have just 15 YEARS of progressively worsening weather with extreme storms before we face the possibility of an Arctic methane induced 8\u00b0C atmospheric temperature rise with associated global deglaciation and extinction<br />\n<br />\nThe floating Arctic ice cap is mostly being melted from underneath by globally heated ocean waters, as are the Greenland and Antarctic glaciers .<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT ALLOW pollution hot line to climatic hell. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/lada-latent-autoimmune-diabetes-of.html?showComment=1481790459195#c7657073299710436340\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 15, 2016 at 1:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_129MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nARCTIC ICE IS AT ITS LOWEST LEVEL IN SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH\u2026 I HAD PRDICTED THIS EIGHT MONTHS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nARCTIC RATE OF WARMING IS NOW NEARLY THREE TIMES AS FAST AS THE REST OF THE PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS THE CULPRIT?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS METHANE !<br />\n<br />\nTHE ZONIST JEW AGENTS WHO CONTROLLED PARIS COP21 IGNORED METHANE TOTALLY \u2013 AND NITROUS OXIDE TOO.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY LEADER ON THE PLANET PLAYED BALL INCLUDING ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI.<br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nArctic permafrost has rapidly thawed, and increased the incidence of RED algae blooms ( appears pink with white snow ) related to ocean acidification due to Methane in sea water<br />\n<br />\nOceanic microorganisms and bacteria survive by consuming dissolved organic carbon, or DOC\u2014derived from methane<br />\n<br />\nSubsea permafrost occurs beneath the seabed and exists in the continental shelves of the polar regions. These areas formed during the last ice age, when a larger portion of earth's water was bound up in ice sheets on land and when sea levels were low.<br />\n<br />\nAs the ice sheets melted to again become seawater, the permafrost became submerged shelves under relatively warm and salty boundary conditions, compared to surface permafrost<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost carbon cycle (Arctic Carbon Cycle) deals with the transfer of carbon from permafrost soils to terrestrial vegetation and microbes, to the atmosphere, back to vegetation, and finally back to permafrost soils through burial and sedimentation due to cryogenic processes.<br />\n<br />\nSome of this carbon is transferred to the ocean and other portions of the globe through the global carbon cycle. The cycle includes the exchange of methane between terrestrial components and the atmosphere , as well as the transfer of carbon between land and water as methane , and dissolved carbon..<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide in Earth's atmosphere is a trace gas, currently having an average concentration of 402 parts per million by volume (or 611 parts per million by mass).<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide (CO2) is produced by all aerobic organisms when they metabolize carbohydrates and lipids to produce energy by respiration. It is returned to water via the gills of fish and to the air via the lungs of air-breathing land animals, including humans. CO2 is a life sustaining useful gas.<br />\n<br />\nA HUGE percentage of ocean\u2019s deep water DOC is methane-derived.. When utilized by marine microorganisms, methane-derived DOC is a component of deep ocean ecosystems. Microbial processing of this DOC contributes to increased CO2 in the deep ocean and thus to ocean acidification.<br />\n<br />\nDOC that comes from methane is a new part of the carbon cycle that hasn\u2019t really been HIDDEN DELIBERATELY by Zionist Jews who want CO2 to be the culprit\u2014to force India to mothball coal on COP22.<br />\n<br />\nHuman-made carbon dioxide (CO2) has NOTHING to do with global warming or climate change<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI , IF YOU PLAY BALL WITH JEW ROTHSCHILD BY MOTHBALLING COAL \u2014WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WILL MAKE SURE YOU REMAIN IN TIHAR JAIL TILL YOUR DIE\u2014<br />\n<br />\n-- OR YOU CAN ESCAPE ( LIKE VIJAYA MALLAY ) AND RETIRE IN ISRAEL, WHERE YOUR DEAR PATRON JEW ROTHSCHILD WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_167B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c86398361683780410\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_60M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. WE THE PEOPLE HAVE NOT SOLD BHARATMATA TO GUJJU NO 2 MODI...<br />\n<br />\nAcross the Arctic, temperatures are approximately three degrees Centigratde above normal, and the Arctic Ocean sea ice is at a record low for late February 2018.<br />\n<br />\nAs frigid air sweeps across Europe, the Arctic itself is seeing an unprecedented warm spell.<br />\n<br />\nIn northernmost Greenland, it was 6 degrees Celsius above zero yesterday. And it's consistently been above zero for the last fortnight.<br />\n<br />\nOver the pole from Europe, nearly a third of the ice covering the Bering Sea to the west of Alaska has also disappeared. But this was no gradual process; the ice retreated over an astonishing eight days in mid-February 2018.<br />\n<br />\nArctic sea ice has been retreating at record rates-- and the blame is falling on CO2 and Indian coal ?<br />\n<br />\nThe Gulf Stream, carrying warm Atlantic water, moves north along the Norwegian coast and divides into two main branches, one on either side side of the island archipelago of Svalbard.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Arctic Ocean, this Atlantic water becomes denser as it cools and therefore sinks. After circulating, the now cold water leaves the Arctic Ocean, mainly through the Fram Strait between Svalbard and Greenland.<br />\n<br />\nShriveling sea ice also has turned the region into something of a new frontier.<br />\n<br />\nWHITE JEWS are eyeing the Arctic\u2019s opening sea routes, its strategic position between Eurasia and North America, and its potentially huge reserves of oil and gas, as well as other resources.<br />\n<br />\nA new enemy is undermining ice floating on the Arctic Ocean: heat from below.<br />\n<br />\nWarm Atlantic waters, delivered by an offshoot of the Gulf Stream, have long been known to prevent ice formation north of Scandinavia, on the western side of the Eurasian basin.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_192BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_191TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_191TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_191B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3265753235317032373\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_191M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/britannia-did-not-rule-waves-and-this.html?showComment=1519818570561#c3265753235317032373\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 28, 2018 at 5:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nSatellite data show that, in general, sea ice is much more prevalent in the eastern side of the basin, north of Siberia. But over the last decade, ice has also begun to disappear here, too. It used to persist through the sunny summers, allowing several years of ice growth to accumulate.<br />\n<br />\nNow, the ice melts in summer, causing the total time without floating ice in the region to jump from less than 1 month per year to more than three.<br />\n<br />\nBetween Norway and Greenland in the western Eurasian basin, Atlantic currents flow into the Arctic at a depth of 200 to 250 meters, about 4\u00b0C warmer than the surface water. In winter, cold air cools surface waters until they fall and mix with the warm waters below.<br />\n<br />\nThat creates an overall warmer, well-mixed ocean over the top 250 meters, and one with little sea ice.<br />\n<br />\nOn the eastern side of the basin, however, the warm Atlantic waters were kept at bay\u2014until recently.<br />\n<br />\nThe currents lurked at a depth of about 150 meters, but they didn\u2019t mix much with surface layers, because of a barrier called the cold halocline layer (CHL)\u2014a boundary between salty deep waters and fresher water on top. Summer ice, as it forms, rejects salt, leading to the creation of dense, salty waters just below the ice.<br />\n<br />\nThose waters are heavier, and as they fall they create a highly stratified ocean.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe top of the Atlantic water, according to one mooring, had risen from a depth of 150 meters in the winter of 2003 to a depth of 70 meters just a decade later. Without summer sea ice forming to establish the CHL, he says, the ocean mixes more\u2014and less ice forms.<br />\n<br />\nA positive feedback loop is underway, in which less summer sea ice will lead to warmer winter waters and even less summer ice in subsequent years..<br />\n<br />\nBASTARDS !<br />\n<br />\nMOTHER FUCKERS !<br />\n<br />\nAAARRRGGHH PPTTHHEEOOOYYYYYYYYY !!!<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2847617371403625632\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 13, 2018 at 9:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-government-sued-after-failing-to-submit-climate-change-report/articleshow/63288637.cms<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW JEW DARLING AND ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI TO MOTHBALL COAL--COME WHAT MAY..EVEN IF HE TAKES A RETIREMENT HOME IN ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html<br />\n<br />\nWE KNWO HOW GUJJU NO 1 BLED BHARATMATA<br />\n<br />\nWILL WILL NOT ALLOW GUJJU NO 2 TO BLEED BHARATMATA -- HIMMAT HAI TO KARKE DEKH NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI ...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_167B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><br /></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_167B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><br /></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_167B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9105617547092292125\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_163M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html?showComment=1521214252772#c9105617547092292125\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 16, 2018 at 9:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_163MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDUE TO METHANE LEAKS FROM US FRACKING THE GULF STREAM IS NOW METHANE LADEN MAKING IT WARMER AND CAUSED IT TO SHIFT ITS ORIGINAL COURSE WHICH EXISTED FROM THE BEGINNING OF TIME..<br /><br />The Gulf Stream influences the climate of the east coast of North America from Florida to Newfoundland, and the west coast of Europe<br /><br />A warmer Arctic could halt the Gulf Stream, which brings warmer water and weather to north-western Europe. There\u2019s no land at the North Pole \u2014 it\u2019s a frozen ocean.<br /><br />In winter in the Arctic it is complete darkness yet temperatures spiked 7.2 deg C The sun set in October 2017 and won\u2019t be seen until March 2018 , yet the thermometer reads like summer. Temperatures should be sub zero but are instead above the freezing point.<br /><br />The extent of frozen seawater floating in the Arctic Ocean reached new lows in January / February in 4 decades of satellite monitoring.<br /><br />The arctic was 6.1 degrees Celsius warmer than usual on February 2018<br /><br />February 2018 also saw the greatest loss of Arctic sea ice since man came on earth.. Record-low levels of sea ice in the Bering Sea and the Arctic are shattering all known records.<br /><br />Warming Arctic decreases the strength of the jet stream. This air current acts like a tourniquet keeping Arctic air from bleeding out over North America.<br /><br />The extreme weather that has brought snow and bitter cold to much of Europe in recent days is part of a remarkable temperature inversion that has also enveloped the Arctic with unprecedented warmth.<br /><br />Thinner, receding ice allows the ocean\u2019s heat to escape more readily into the atmosphere, which the Arctic\u2019s highly stable lower atmosphere traps near the surface during the polar night. As a result, winter surface air temperatures have warmed more in the Arctic compared with the global average.<br />Thinner sea ice is more mobile and deforms more easily from winds and currents. In February, southerly surface winds blew sea ice away from the northern shore of Greenland, causing the largest expanse of open ocean in winter ever recorded by satellites. S imilarly, the Bering Sea experienced extreme sea ice retreat this winter.<br /><br />With more open ocean, major wind storms generate large waves that cause damaging coastal erosion, endangering oceanside towns.<br /><br />In January 2018, the eastern US and Canada suffered a record-breaking \u201cpolar vortex\u201d that brought plunging temperatures and led Niagara Falls to freeze.<br /><br />A polar vortex is a mass of cold air that sits above the Earth\u2019s north and south poles. This cold air is controlled by a large pocket of low pressure, which rotates in an anti-clockwise direction at the North Pole and clockwise at the South Pole.<br /><br />A polar vortex is an upper level low-pressure area lying near the Earth's poles. There are two polar vortices in the Earth's atmosphere, overlying the North and South Poles. It ALWAYS exists near the poles, but weakens in summer and strengthens in winter. The term \"vortex\" refers to the counter-clockwise flow of air that helps keep the colder air near the Poles.<br /><br />The jet stream is strongest in winter, when it has the greatest effect on weather in more densely populated parts of North America and Eurasia.<br /><br />When it rolls along in relatively steady waves, normal weather ensues, with spells of cold, snow and intermittent warm-ups.<br /><br />But when it coils far to the south, bitter cold Arctic air spills southward along with it. Wriggling like a garden hose, each southward kink in the wind tends to be balanced out by a northward bend somewhere else. That can lead to the western states, even Alaska, being unusually warm and dry while the middle of the country and the eastern states freeze.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_163BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_163b+seedZT8D\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_162T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_162TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_162TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_162TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_162TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_162B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4839838696655631073\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_162M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html?showComment=1521214280038#c4839838696655631073\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 16, 2018 at 9:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_162MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br /><br />Northern jet stream would start shifting southward, which would bring cold polar air with it, causing colder and snowier North American winters. Loss of Arctic sea ice shifts the jet stream further south than normal resulting in increased rain during the summer in northwest Europe.<br /><br />Normally, when the vortex is strong and healthy, it helps keep a current of air known as the jet stream traveling around the globe in a pretty circular path. This current keeps the cold air up north and the warm air down south.<br /><br />But without that strong low-pressure system, the jet stream doesn\u2019t have much to keep it in line. It becomes wavy and rambling. Put a couple of areas of high-pressure systems in its way, and all of a sudden you have a river of cold air being pushed down south along with the rest of the polar vortex system.<br /><br />When polar ice melts, more warmth escapes from the ocean into the air \u2014 which can affect the atmosphere up to 30km high, weakening the polar vortex.<br /><br />This allows frigid air to break out of the Arctic and threaten Russia and Europe with cold extremes<br /><br />Large quantities of methane are stored in the Arctic in natural gas deposits, permafrost, and as undersea clathrates. Permafrost and clathrates degrade on warming, thus large releases of methane from these sources<br /><br />The release of methane from the Arctic is in itself a major contributor to global warming as a result of polar amplification.<br /><br />Sea ice, and the cold conditions it sustains, serves to stabilise methane deposits on and near the shoreline, preventing the clathrate breaking down and outgassing methane into the atmosphere, causing further warming.<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_167B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wJBEBtRzEWY/WEuY0PElHiI/AAAAAAABPlQ/g_ZFIGgKcCYF2iHjdZRKHK4F5cv_o176gCLcB/s1600/IMG_8872%2Bcopy.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wJBEBtRzEWY/WEuY0PElHiI/AAAAAAABPlQ/g_ZFIGgKcCYF2iHjdZRKHK4F5cv_o176gCLcB/s640/IMG_8872%2Bcopy.JPG\" width=\"258\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_167MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_168b+seedTlVqD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_168b+seedTlVqD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Not because they got screwed by Stinger Missiles.<br />\n<br />\nNo Russian helicopter or MIG jet was ever made without INFRA RED COUNTERMEASURES .An infrared countermeasure (IRCM) is a device designed to protect aircraft from infrared homing (\"heat seeking\") missiles by confusing the missiles' infrared guidance system so that they will miss their target (Electronic countermeasure).Flares create infrared targets with a much stronger signature than the aircraft's engines. The flares provide false targets that cause the missile to make incorrect steering decisions. The missile will rapidly break off a target lock-on.<br />\n<br />\nSO --<br />\n<br />\nFUCK YOU CHARLIE WILSON !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. THE TRUTH HAS NEVER BEEN WRITTEN.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD HISTORIANS LIE: \"The Civil War started because of uncompromising differences between the free and slave states over the power of the national government to prohibit slavery in the territories that had not yet become states\"<br />\n<br />\nThe civil war began when the Confederates bombarded Union soldiers at Fort Sumter, South Carolina on April 12, 1861. The war ended in Spring, 1865. Robert E. Lee surrendered the last major Confederate army to Ulysses S. Grant at Appomattox Courthouse on April 9, 1865. The last battle was fought at Palmito Ranch, Texas, on May 13, 1865.<br />\n<br />\nThe Civil War was fought in thousands of different places, from southern Pennsylvania to Texas; from New Mexico to the Florida coast. The majority of the fighting took place in the states of Virginia and Tennessee. The Civil War was also contested on the Atlantic Ocean as far off as the coast of France, the Gulf of Mexico, and the brown water of the Mississippi River and its tributaries.<br />\n<br />\nAt the beginning of the war the Northern states had a combined population of 22 million people. The Southern states had a combined population of about 9 million. This disparity was reflected in the size of the armies in the field. The Union forces outnumbered the Confederates roughly two to one.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD FUNDED AND ARMED BOTH SIDES<br />\n<br />\nMore than 9.3 lakh soldiers died from combat, accident, starvation, and disease during the Civil War.<br />\n<br />\nThe Northern armies were victorious, and the rebellious states returned to the Union.<br />\n<br />\nThe WHITE Irish were the planet's first slaves The potato blight in Ireland was created by Jew Rothschild. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/lada-latent-autoimmune-diabetes-of.html?showComment=1481790459195#c7657073299710436340\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 15, 2016 at 1:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_129MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nARCTIC ICE IS AT ITS LOWEST LEVEL IN SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH\u2026 I HAD PRDICTED THIS EIGHT MONTHS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nARCTIC RATE OF WARMING IS NOW NEARLY THREE TIMES AS FAST AS THE REST OF THE PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS THE CULPRIT?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS METHANE !<br />\n<br />\nTHE ZONIST JEW AGENTS WHO CONTROLLED PARIS COP21 IGNORED METHANE TOTALLY \u2013 AND NITROUS OXIDE TOO.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY LEADER ON THE PLANET PLAYED BALL INCLUDING ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI.<br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nArctic permafrost has rapidly thawed, and increased the incidence of RED algae blooms ( appears pink with white snow ) related to ocean acidification due to Methane in sea water<br />\n<br />\nOceanic microorganisms and bacteria survive by consuming dissolved organic carbon, or DOC\u2014derived from methane<br />\n<br />\nSubsea permafrost occurs beneath the seabed and exists in the continental shelves of the polar regions. These areas formed during the last ice age, when a larger portion of earth's water was bound up in ice sheets on land and when sea levels were low.<br />\n<br />\nAs the ice sheets melted to again become seawater, the permafrost became submerged shelves under relatively warm and salty boundary conditions, compared to surface permafrost<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost carbon cycle (Arctic Carbon Cycle) deals with the transfer of carbon from permafrost soils to terrestrial vegetation and microbes, to the atmosphere, back to vegetation, and finally back to permafrost soils through burial and sedimentation due to cryogenic processes.<br />\n<br />\nSome of this carbon is transferred to the ocean and other portions of the globe through the global carbon cycle. The cycle includes the exchange of methane between terrestrial components and the atmosphere , as well as the transfer of carbon between land and water as methane , and dissolved carbon..<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide in Earth's atmosphere is a trace gas, currently having an average concentration of 402 parts per million by volume (or 611 parts per million by mass).<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide (CO2) is produced by all aerobic organisms when they metabolize carbohydrates and lipids to produce energy by respiration. It is returned to water via the gills of fish and to the air via the lungs of air-breathing land animals, including humans. CO2 is a life sustaining useful gas.<br />\n<br />\nA HUGE percentage of ocean\u2019s deep water DOC is methane-derived.. When utilized by marine microorganisms, methane-derived DOC is a component of deep ocean ecosystems. Microbial processing of this DOC contributes to increased CO2 in the deep ocean and thus to ocean acidification.<br />\n<br />\nDOC that comes from methane is a new part of the carbon cycle that hasn\u2019t really been HIDDEN DELIBERATELY by Zionist Jews who want CO2 to be the culprit\u2014to force India to mothball coal on COP22.<br />\n<br />\nHuman-made carbon dioxide (CO2) has NOTHING to do with global warming or climate change<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI , IF YOU PLAY BALL WITH JEW ROTHSCHILD BY MOTHBALLING COAL \u2014WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WILL MAKE SURE YOU REMAIN IN TIHAR JAIL TILL YOUR DIE\u2014<br />\n<br />\n-- OR YOU CAN ESCAPE ( LIKE VIJAYA MALLAY ) AND RETIRE IN ISRAEL, WHERE YOUR DEAR PATRON JEW ROTHSCHILD WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5061354986435938625\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_136M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WHAT POWER DOES SASIKALA NATARAJAN AND \"</b><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">MANNARGUDI MAFIA</b><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\" WIELD ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ECMO( used on Jaya ) &nbsp;is a heart and lung bypass -- extracorporeal\nlife support (ECLS).. ECMO provides the mechanism for gas exchange while\nbypassing the heart and lungs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The procedure\nmechanically supports the patient\u2019s circulation and gas exchange, normally\nperformed by the heart and lungs, thus giving those organs an opportunity to \u201cREST.\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">( PROVIDED SOUL HAS NOT DECIDED TO COME OUT ) </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ECMO machine takes\nblue blood (without oxygen) out of the right side of the heart and pumps it\nthrough the artificial lung (oxygenator). The blood, now oxygen-rich, is then\nwarmed and returned to the patient<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2ZcbxkUhtGA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2ZcbxkUhtGA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two\nconfigurations with ECMO: a veno-venous (VV) configuration to provide\noxygenation in patients with respiratory failure and a <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">veno-arterial (VA)\nconfiguration to provide both oxygenation and circulation</span> in patients with\nrespiratory and cardiac failure<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two most common\ntypes of ECMO are veno-arterial ECMO (VA-ECMO) and veno-venous ECMO (VV-ECMO). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both forms, blood is\ndrained from the venous systems using large percutaneous cannulas where oxygen\nis added and carbon dioxide is removed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In VA-ECMO this blood\nis returned to the arterial system and in VV-ECMO the blood is returned to the\nvenous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xHmr4CUYRl0/WETcDJPQEHI/AAAAAAABPhk/de0PXXRVhvMjbnzRdkveM_ZTtfqH88R7ACEw/s1600/Fig-1-VV-ECMO-Cavoatrial-con-fi-guratiowwn-of-VV-ECMO-shown-using-bifemoral-approach.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"462\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xHmr4CUYRl0/WETcDJPQEHI/AAAAAAABPhk/de0PXXRVhvMjbnzRdkveM_ZTtfqH88R7ACEw/s640/Fig-1-VV-ECMO-Cavoatrial-con-fi-guratiowwn-of-VV-ECMO-shown-using-bifemoral-approach.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wF8BsweHyws/WETq-Gi7YpI/AAAAAAABPio/wUKvHTBkbx4pVgDPbEIVgnOV3ex5SembgCLcB/s1600/jnr376w-g88002.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"344\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wF8BsweHyws/WETq-Gi7YpI/AAAAAAABPio/wUKvHTBkbx4pVgDPbEIVgnOV3ex5SembgCLcB/s640/jnr376w-g88002.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apnea, the absence of\nspontaneous breathing, is an essential criterion for the diagnosis of brain\ndeath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The neurological\ncriteria for brain death include coma, absent brain stem reflexes, and apnea.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;For\npatients on extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), routine apnea testing\nis not possible because gas exchange occurs entirely through the membrane\noxygenator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PaCO2 level must be\nhigh enough to ensure supramaximal stimulation of the medullary respiratory\ncenters<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Partial pressure of\ncarbon dioxide in the arterial blood; arterial carbon dioxide concentration or\ntension. It is usually expressed in millimeters of mercury (mm Hg).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RqfKUvUoESo/WETf6GH-3dI/AAAAAAABPh0/6tKnGVbzvxQ4zM_El4rNhwpwoCgnVIiCACLcB/s1600/brain-death-eepresentation-24-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RqfKUvUoESo/WETf6GH-3dI/AAAAAAABPh0/6tKnGVbzvxQ4zM_El4rNhwpwoCgnVIiCACLcB/s640/brain-death-eepresentation-24-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><b>I kept the post below simple,&nbsp;</b></span><b style=\"font-size: xx-large;\">&nbsp;for the LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR</b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/hyperventilation-followed-by-valsalva.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/hyperventilation-followed-by-valsalva.html</a></span><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QprxiQRCXdM/WEWo7hW-U0I/AAAAAAABPjc/qN7ssqeGr8wiF_OKmvBOTt2tCcfFPm2QwCLcB/s1600/arterial-blood-gas-iEE22nterpretation-by-dr-prashant-kumar-33-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QprxiQRCXdM/WEWo7hW-U0I/AAAAAAABPjc/qN7ssqeGr8wiF_OKmvBOTt2tCcfFPm2QwCLcB/s640/arterial-blood-gas-iEE22nterpretation-by-dr-prashant-kumar-33-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In veno-veno (VV)\nsupport, blood is drained from the venous system, oxygenated, cleared of carbon\ndioxide, and then pumped back into the central venous system (i.e. into the\nright atrium or cavoatrial junction), is typically used for isolated pulmonary\nfailure. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D3_fQKcGNlg/WEToaAg-BXI/AAAAAAABPiY/CkeW_Ke-iZwyd5jfB4ILWhqa1uuqZxNzwCLcB/s1600/ecmo-dinnagrams.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D3_fQKcGNlg/WEToaAg-BXI/AAAAAAABPiY/CkeW_Ke-iZwyd5jfB4ILWhqa1uuqZxNzwCLcB/s640/ecmo-dinnagrams.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For patients with\ncardiac failure or combined cardiopulmonary failure, venoarterial (VA) support\nis typically used.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike VV support, in<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> VA support, blood is returned back\ninto the arterial system</span> \u2013 often as close to the coronary arteries and/or\ncerebral arterial system as possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CaQTZ6ahf9o/WEThl0qIprI/AAAAAAABPiA/l6vlT8Zkkh8_IcIykPl14MDAmLMIl5mOACLcB/s1600/jnr376w-88g001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CaQTZ6ahf9o/WEThl0qIprI/AAAAAAABPiA/l6vlT8Zkkh8_IcIykPl14MDAmLMIl5mOACLcB/s1600/jnr376w-88g001.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4F874Uv_fHk/WETh-ttEGCI/AAAAAAABPiE/rkmo900gqWg77hQtZTbCHJOFHd2koWVPACLcB/s1600/quick-interpretation-of-bl99yood-gases-4-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4F874Uv_fHk/WETh-ttEGCI/AAAAAAABPiE/rkmo900gqWg77hQtZTbCHJOFHd2koWVPACLcB/s640/quick-interpretation-of-bl99yood-gases-4-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rXx2TQmSTIg/WETipd2EzFI/AAAAAAABPiI/lfHp3lVeEncR1fwYAwjdTQmMNa81CXo2gCLcB/s1600/slidtte_22.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rXx2TQmSTIg/WETipd2EzFI/AAAAAAABPiI/lfHp3lVeEncR1fwYAwjdTQmMNa81CXo2gCLcB/s640/slidtte_22.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brain death (BD)\ndetermination requires a 6-hour legal observation which includes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coma status with absent brainstem reflexes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Absence of cortical electric activity as\ndocumented on an electroencephalogram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Absence of spontaneous breathing as\ndocumented by an apnea test (AT)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Positivity of AT is\nconfirmed by the absence of respiratory movements and arterial carbon dioxide\npartial pressure (PaCO2) &gt;60 mmHg, with an increase of &gt;20 mmHg from\nbaseline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The principle behind\nthe apnoea test is that the absence of an appropriate respiratory drive, as\nmanifested by an increased in PaCO2 following a CO2 challenge, is indicative of\na potentially irreversible brain-stem injury and, therefore, when positive,\nsupportive of the diagnosis of brain death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proper conduct of the\ntest involves insuring an adequate blood pressure, preoxygenation with 100%\noxygen for at least 10 min with a goal PaO2 &gt; 200 mmHg, normo-capnia with a\nventilatory rate of 10 breaths/min, and a reduction of positive end-expiratory\npressure to </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria math&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u223c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n5 mmHg. If the patient remains hemodynamically stable and blood saturation\nremains &gt;95%, then a baseline, pretest, arterial blood gas is obtained.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\npatient is then disconnected from the ventilator, but given a source of oxygen.\nA continuous source of oxygen, such as a T-piece or cannula placed directly\ninto the trachea, is mandatory to prevent acute hypoxemia and therefore in\nvalidating the test.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 8 min of observation, a repeat blood gas is\nobtained. If the PCO2 level is &gt;60 mmHg or 20 mmHg above the baseline, then\nthe test is considered positive and diagnostic of brain death<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For patients being\nsupported on veno-arterial ECMO, pulsatile flow and blood pressures might be\ntoo low as mandated by the AAN ( American academy of Neurology ) prior to\nattempting an apnea test. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A systolic blood pressure &gt;100 mmHg is a\nprerequisite for apnea testing \u2013 a threshold that might be very difficult to\naccomplish in patients on VA-ECMO with non-pulsatile flow in the absence of\nsignificant doses of vasoactive agents. In such circumstances, &nbsp;use mean arterial pressure of 75-80 mmHg as an\nappropriate surrogate<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5m72pV5OX_Q/WETn71rM3kI/AAAAAAABPiU/9rPrabsK3JEsPpl6iDjKN8EaCv65XJBCQCLcB/s1600/z-ben-ma-ecmo-pgy-3-888talk-43-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5m72pV5OX_Q/WETn71rM3kI/AAAAAAABPiU/9rPrabsK3JEsPpl6iDjKN8EaCv65XJBCQCLcB/s640/z-ben-ma-ecmo-pgy-3-888talk-43-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Veno-arterial (VA) ECMO\napnea testing can be done in patients on ECMO without the need for ancillary\ntesting. &nbsp;The mainstay of performing apnea\ntesting on these patients is decreasing the gas sweep rate to 0.5 - 1 L/minute\nwhile maintaining the same blood flow rate.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dFeAuTFlJuc/WEWnzsx2vJI/AAAAAAABPjM/Vy7fFw6RdYo306fgkVZ3-3Q2e2LFN7EtACLcB/s1600/slid33We_5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dFeAuTFlJuc/WEWnzsx2vJI/AAAAAAABPjM/Vy7fFw6RdYo306fgkVZ3-3Q2e2LFN7EtACLcB/s640/slid33We_5.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apnea testing involves\ndisconnecting the mechanical ventilator, observing for spontaneous respirations\nand, if none, measuring the PaCO2 after 8 \u2013 10 min. The test is positive if the\nPaCO2 is \u2265 60 mm Hg or has increased \u2265 20 mm Hg above the baseline.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/asd-atrial-septal-defect-hole-in-heart.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/asd-atrial-septal-defect-hole-in-heart.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/heart-matters-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/heart-matters-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Cmdjw60SlsU/WEWoGN8qEKI/AAAAAAABPjQ/68efZZFGqvUn5zss18jTJsW9uS0cu_KGwCLcB/s1600/transport-of-oxygen-aEEnd-carbon-dioxide-29-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Cmdjw60SlsU/WEWoGN8qEKI/AAAAAAABPjQ/68efZZFGqvUn5zss18jTJsW9uS0cu_KGwCLcB/s640/transport-of-oxygen-aEEnd-carbon-dioxide-29-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; IMPORTANT...... IMPORTANT.......... THE WARSHIP INS BETWA , CAPSIZED WHILE UNDOCKING FROM DRYDOCK , DUE TO STABILITY CALCULATIONS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY ..................... I AM A SHIP CAPTAIN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE ............. VIRTUAL LOSS OF GM DUE TO UPTHRUST .................... To calculate virtual loss of GM :-............. P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )....... virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes )............. Not many people realise that KM reduces with increase of trim................this is the reason why docking/ undocking trim by stern must be as small as possible\u2026\u2026\u2026.. while undocking the most critical and dangerous period is when the ship is afloat with only the aftermost part of keel resting on the aftermost block \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..FIRST STEP TO SALVAGE THE PATHETIC INDIAN NAVY IS TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF THEIR UNIFORM FROM WHITE TO KHAKHI............. ALL RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE INCLUDING THE CAPTAIN MUST BE SACKED......... THIS IS SHEER INCOMPETENCE........... The interval of time between the stern post landing on the blocks and the ship taking the blocks overall is referred to as the critical period....... During this period part of the weight of the ship is being borne by the blocks, and this creates an upthrust at the stern which increases as the water level falls in the drydock. ......The upthrust causes a virtual loss in metacentric height and it is essential that positive effective metacentric height be maintained throughout the critical period, or the ship will heel over and perhaps slip off the blocks with disastrous results. ....capt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; Not because they got screwed by Stinger Missiles.<br />\n<br />\nNo Russian helicopter or MIG jet was ever made without INFRA RED COUNTERMEASURES .An infrared countermeasure (IRCM) is a device designed to protect aircraft from infrared homing (\"heat seeking\") missiles by confusing the missiles' infrared guidance system so that they will miss their target (Electronic countermeasure).Flares create infrared targets with a much stronger signature than the aircraft's engines. The flares provide false targets that cause the missile to make incorrect steering decisions. The missile will rapidly break off a target lock-on.<br />\n<br />\nSO --<br />\n<br />\nFUCK YOU CHARLIE WILSON !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/edmund-hillary-faking-mount-everest.html?showComment=1482765516238#c658723307741500676\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 26, 2016 at 8:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_56MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/extracorporeal-membrane-oxygenation.html<br /><br />ECMO MACHINES ARE USED TO EMBALM THE DEAD -- ALSO FOR CRYOPRESERVATION<br /><br />http://techiewheels.com/apollo-hospitals-to-charge-hefty-rs-90-crores-towards-late-jayalalitha-medical-expense/<br /><br />Anna Bagenholm holds the world record for living through the lowest core body temperature: 57 degrees. On May 20, 1999, the then 28-year-old was skiing with two friends down a waterfall gully in northern Norway when she fell into the water and became wedged between rocks under a thick layer of ice, with a pocket of air to breathe. Her friends tried to pry her to safety, but they quickly discovered that they couldn\u2019t free her and phoned for help, watching in anguish as she struggled. Forty minutes later, Bagenholm stopped moving.<br /><br />About an hour passed before a rescue team arrived. They cut a hole in the ice and pulled Bagenholm\u2019s limp body out of the water. She wasn\u2019t breathing and had no detectable pulse. The paramedics started CPR, and a few minutes later a helicopter arrived to medevac her to Norway\u2019s Tromso University hospital.<br /><br />At the hospital, a team of cardiac surgeons, anesthesiologists, and nurses were waiting. They continued doing CPR and prepped Bagenholm for ECMO. As her core body temperature crept back up, her heart began beating again. Bagenholm spent six weeks in intensive care and eventually moved to a rehabilitation unit. Her mental function was completely normal upon waking, but her physical recovery took much longer. After two years she returned to work and resumed some hiking and skiing. Today she\u2019s a radiologist in the hospital where she was saved, and she lectures at conferences about the potential to rescue others like her. She gets annoyed when she reads in the newspaper that a person was found in the cold and declared dead before they were taken to the hospital and rewarmed. \u201cThe most important thing is to not declare people dead outside. If it\u2019s possible, start CPR, take them into the hospital, put them on ECMO, and rewarm them with everything you\u2019ve got. Don\u2019t give up. Even if it looks like the person is not going to make it, you have to keep on until it\u2019s really over.\u201d<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>TO BE CONTINUED-</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EVV-HsaUp3w/WEUtEZ5gInI/AAAAAAABPi8/8G0-ljcuIYsdpzbBhy3-C8Oc9eN0c73CwCLcB/s1600/AJIT%2B1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EVV-HsaUp3w/WEUtEZ5gInI/AAAAAAABPi8/8G0-ljcuIYsdpzbBhy3-C8Oc9eN0c73CwCLcB/s640/AJIT%2B1.jpg\" width=\"360\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "258", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2981111598482515931/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5669599575465969855", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2016-12-03T11:31:00+05:30", "updated": "2016-12-04T20:44:32+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDgwODY0NDcyODMwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/umblical-hernia-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5669599575465969855", "title": "UMBILICAL  HERNIA -  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_16TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_16TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none;
